Скайрим для всех!
Skyrim уже стало словом нарицательным. И очень не благодарное дело писать обзор на эту первокласную игру! Это какобъять необъятное, охватить неохватное или впихнуть невпихуемое в 4350 символов, которыми ограничен обзор в Steam!
Скажу только вот что игра затянет вас не на одну сотню часов, 9десь вы можите быть кем угодно и выбирать занятие себе по душе. Скайрим стала приемницей лучших традиций TES и подняла планку качества на новый не виданный до селе уровень.

Увидим ли мы достойное продолжение серии? Время покажет! 
Сейчас же TES 5: Skyrim - это игра мечта, игра легенда!

Отличная игра!
Игра стоит потраченых на неё недель: интересный сюжет и побочные задания, отличная графика и музыкальное сопровождение, неповторимая атмосфера TES, всё это затянет вас прочно и на долго.
Хочешь быть магом пожалуйста, хочешь воином нет проблем, ассасином, тоже не вопрос, хочешь быть ими всеми вместе-легко, всё зависит только от Вас!
Эту игру можно начинать заново несметное число раз, и всегда будешь находить для себя что то новое!
Игра со всеми дополнениями это заслуженные 10\10!!!
Если вы пропустили эту игру - вы пропустили многое!

Когда играешь за ХиллиБилли и выжившие надирают тебе зад - остается 2 генератора а ты их видел только издали. Когда их наконец поцарапал, а питание на двери уже подано. Но тебе везет с воротами - расположены рядом. Когда тебе везет положить всех выживших, не дав им открыть ворота, но крюков нигде нет. И вот они лежат и потихоньку, почти одновременно, умирают - начинают дрожать руки от понимания что все они сдохнут!

M U A Z Z A M !! Birkaç gameplay videosunu izledikten sonra içime dert olup rüyalarıma giren, oynamazsam olmaz dediğim ve ilk fırsatta aldığım keyifli açık dünya, keşif, hayatta kalma oyunu. Sularla kaplı bir gezegende mahsur kalışımız ve kaçma çabalarımız diye özetleyebiliriz. Yalnız olduğumuzu birçok noktada doruklarımızda hissettiren, derinlerde zaman zaman kendi gölgemizden bile tırsmamıza sebep olan, oyunun sonuna yaklaştıkça "acaba hiç kaçmasam da buraya mı yerleşsem dedirten" ve bitmesini istemeyeceğiniz cinsten bir dünyası ve atmosferi olan tatlı mı tatlı bir oyun. Eğer ki hayatta kalma, üretme/inşa etme, açık dünya temelli oyunları seviyorsanız kesinlikle denemelisiniz. Eşine zor rastlanır cinsten bir dünya sunuyor bu oyun bizlere. Hiç olmazsa arada bir boy verip çıkarsınız :)
非常适合朋友间游玩

J'ai enfin trouvé la perle du jeu vidéo . Ce jeu est peut être en accès anticipé mais il est bien juste incroyable. 
Les graphismes sont juste magnifique et l'aspect roleplay et RPG avec de la magie tout sa est juste très bien respecté.
Ce jeu est très dur du sens ou dans ce jeu il faudra toujours réfléchir . Une seul erreur et tout peut basculer.
Ce qui renforce tout sa , c'est que le jeu se joue à trois , si vous avez des amies , jouez-y !! Sa en faudra la peine .
Le jeu est super détaillé et des jets de dé qui fait pensé à roll 20 et les jeux comme donjon et dragon et d'autre jeu sur table.

je ne commente normalement jamais de jeu mais ce jeu est un miracle du jeu vidéo . C'est 15 euros vous allez les jouirs !

I absolutely recommend MHW.  It's worth every penny you pay, and so is it's (currently) upcoming expansion: Iceborne.  The combat is slow, yes, and may be difficult to understand at first, but once you get it, it's like hearing a slow war drum.  It's both soothing and exciting, and you walk away feeling satisfied, even if you lose.

Watching video's and looking over this game in general I thought WOW!!! Finally a great alternative to the crap that is Call of Duty!  I thought this game would be like battlefield 4 or better!  But sadly I was mistaken.

The graphics are the only thing in this game that I find appealing.  

The AI is stupid if it is on your side (squad leader says that there is enemies all along the valley, so what does the AI do? Goes right down the valley)
The AI is wicked smart if it is OPFOR.  Even on Recruit, the easiest of difficulties, the AI can spot you peeking around a corner, laying behind a bush 300M away, and snipe you with 1 hit from 300M away while moving side to side. Bear in mind this is on Recruit difficulty, the "easiest" setting.

The multiplayer is odd.  I mistakenly loaded onto a RPG server, not really knowing what to expect.  I was running around with nothing but clothes on my back.  Then this "cop" detains me for 15 minutes and then throws me in jail.  I can't move, I have no idea how to communicate via chat, and I (this is the kicker) cannot EXIT the session unless I CTRL+ALT+DELETE into task manager to close ARMA from that?  WHAT THE F**K kind of stupid design is that?

I gave up on the Single Player campaign after dying 37 times within the first 10 minutes of the first mission in the 2nd chapter.  How did I die 37 times?  Well again bear in mind this is on the "easiest" setting of Recruit.  I sneak into the village not knowing what I need to do because it really isn't explained wtf is going on.  All I know is I am by myself and I need to find my guys on top of some mountain that is to the right of a mountain with a radio antennae. So I'm sneaking building to building out of nowhere across the map I am getting shot at and I get hit once and boom dead.  Death #1. Repeat 3x.  Finally get ticked off enough to go to youtube and find out what I need to do.  Die 27x more trying to get past the first village with random troops popping up and shooting me dead from across the map, on the "easiest" setting of Recruit.
Finally make it out of the village, up a hill feeling good.  See some sheep, hello sheep whats up.  "Bahh goes the sheep, wait a minute, that doesn't sound like a sheep, no it is a group of soldiers out of nowhere that saw me peeking between a 2" gap in rocks.  Death number 32.  START OVER AGAIN cause you can't save but once per mission apparently.  
Death number 33-37 I made it through the 1st village again with minor difficulties, on the hill got some bad guys and then die by a random grenade. #37 did it for me though.  I haven't thrown anything at my tv for several years, mainly since I stopped playing sport games, but I digress, I threw my mouse at the tv.  Thank god it has a short cord.  
Death #37 I was on this hill again, a copter comes by ok no worries Ill hide here in these rocks.  OK GOOD troops come out walk away.  They are over 500m away and I lean out from cover.  THEY SAW ME as they had their backs turned to me.  I go back into hiding I peek out to see what is going on, BAM dead from a Grenadier 550m away.  
Yea, sorry but Im calling Bullshit.

So Im sorry, but I would rather play BF or CoD.

The game it self is very cool and nice to play. I love the missions and the sniping system.  
Only the cutescenes are bad as hell, same as my English. I give the game a 8/10.

So I think this game is very fun, it is very interesting when people take it as it is A GAME, and don't just kill you but look for ways to torture you or you can torture others, the game is really violent and hostile, I really recommend to play with a friend, I encourage people to try the official servers experience is really interesting all the things you can see and learn from that kind of experience, there are just too many interesting people to meet even though most of them will be hostile but hey thats the game, and I really like it.

The down side of this game however is its optimization , its very bad, you need at least 12GB of RAM to enjoy the game, and at least 2GB of VRAM to play on LOW, that is unacceptable , loading times are horrible almost 10-15 minutes on a HDD and 3-5 on a SSD, however I don't see why is necessary to load all the content on the RAM, VRAM and disk when game loads up, you can't tell me this game is bigger than Witcher 3 or GTA V , the optimization part needs to improve in order to attract more customers, my cousin bought the game with a decent system (1GB VRAM 12GB RAM) and put everything to minimum and it still had issues and very VERY long loading times, I can't recommend this game if you have anything below a 4GB VRAM , 12GB RAM a SSD disk with  a GTX 970 this game devours CPU, GPU , DISK and RAM with last gen graphics so I can't recommend it over other AAA titles but if you want to try it out and it works for you then go ahead its really fun, and of course you can give it a try  since they have the refund policy up to date.

Zuerst war es nur ein kleines Video von HandOfBlood das mich zum spielen von Crusader Kings III inspiriert hat. Doch schon nach den ersten Stunden war da mehr. So viel mehr. Die wunderbar fiesen Intrigen am Hof. Das vergrößern der eigenen Ländereien durch Lebensverkürzende Maßnahmen an Freund und Feind. Das heranziehen der Erben für die Krone. Ja das ist es was dem Leben einen Sinn gibt. Ich wollte immer mehr und mehr. Mein Land wuchs so schnell wie meine Dynastie. Alles wächst und gedeiht. Und als ich es fast geschafft hatte mir einen unsterblichen Namen zu machen, da wurde ich ermordet. Von der eigenen Familie, dem Bruder…dem ich einst das Land rechtmäßig genommen hatte. Doch sei es drum, mein Erbe wird mich rächen. Lang lebe der König!

Ach ja, Fazit zum Spiel und so: Geil, hab ich Bock drauf!

OK I think it's time we set the record straight here, children.
1. I like this game (I liked the original and I was likely younger than you are now when I played it.)
2. This game is a reboot (and a dynamic one at that) of the Godfather: Doom.
3. It Captures, Streamlines and Delivers with heavy blows to the face all that was great about the orignal & more.
4. As one who grew up with this and it's clones, I can definitely say this: Shut up. The 90's were fine! But they weren't THAT fine! Anyone who remembers playing this game and the subsequent clones and bigger-better-badder's will recall that in the 90's we valued gameplay (this got it), we valued graphics that redefined what we knew about graphics (close enough,) and if we got a nice soundtrack to boot, all the better (this'll work) - and finally if it had a story and or lore we cared about; SWEET, bonus right there (check.) That being said, the hardcore difficulty WAS there (also here,) and it WAS just that. HARDCORE. But let's not kid ourselves here... - There was (and still is) a HELL and a WORLD of difference between playing against the CPU on Nightmare and then playing Multiplayer against a superior number of other Doom Entusiasts that were better than you. This principle, BTW, stands to this day, in any FPS. You can check. (They don't count if they're NOT better then you, hotshot!)
5. The new content is certainly an improvement. I can certainly "appreciate" the new snapmap function (even if I'm STILL not that big a multiplayer entusiast) it shows that the Devs care for those who do. Also, the lore's gotten more streamlined, even if it IS a bit of a "slam on the brakes" as I've heard tell, I still remember DOOM 3. Trust me, it's gotten better. (One con, I'm missing some of the "mood ligthting" from the older siblings. Especially Doom 3... I know, I know. It's DOOM, not a horror game and I wholeheartedly agree with whoever came up with the difference between Darks Souls and Doom. Still. Meeting the first Imp felt like sort of a letdown... No jumpscare this time... Aw well...) Anyway, the uh, upgrades and what not? - What for? I like the novelty but, come on? I played the original. We found secrets, sure, but aside from that it was Health'n'Armor'n'Guns'n'ammo'n'shoot'em'in'the'face. We wanted an upgrade? Hell no! We wanted a Bigger Friggin' Gun! Only we didn't use "friggin." Period. It's not a con, I just don't see why you wanna fix something that ain't broken. (Ok now I feel old.)
6. To summarize: This DOOM lives up to the name. I'm not gonna be standing in liine at the Devs with burning effigys. That being said: The Devs know this - Doom the godfather was lightning in a bottle and much much more - It was groundbreaking, it was redefining and it was teethgrinding, tongue-biting, blodthirsty grin-like fun! Any remake of it should rate a SOLID A+ or AT THE VERY LEAST a B- in all of the above and so far, I'm not convinced it deserves that - Jury's still out, I think, if nothing else until they put the smackdown on the Series with DOOM: ETERNAL or beyond.
Having vented my fury I'll get to the point: If you played the original you should play this. (I'll let you decide whether to own it. Kinda makes one remember, doesn't it?) If you HAVEN'T played the original... Hell, you should still play this game - Odds are, if somebody let's you play the original you'll likely think "WHAAAAAaaaat? WTF are you on about? This is so ooooold..." ok just stop it right there. Just play the game. And if nothing else, when the time comes you can sit down with the original and, instead, go "ooooooh. That's where it came from..." Leave it at that. Play the game. I will.

While it may not be up to par with the previous entries in the franchise, Fallout 4 is a very entertaining game on its own. Up til now, the gunplay in the Fallout games have been anywhere between bad to terrible, forcing you to rely on VATS almost religiously. Fallout 4 makes the combat far more satisfying and enjoyable, although this does come at the expense of a more engaging and satisfying story. Despite the disappointing lack of choice and consequence, I'd be remiss if I did not recommend this game to RPG enthusiasts or fans of the franchise as it has plenty of content to keep you occupied and enthused for many hours.

I'm a new player to the game after the release of the NEXT update, and I cannot speak more highly of my experience. The variety you can find from planet to planet in terms of terrain, biomes, and weather is increible -- the graphics are stunning and the soudntrack is good too. The size and scope of everything in NMS is unparalleled in my gaming experience. There is lore, backstory,  and narrative, but maybe not as much as some players may want. The crafting and trading system is fun and extensive, and you can advance through the quests at your own speed. If you're a fan of sandbox, open world, crafting, survival, exploration type games this is for you. If you're not, I still think it's worth a try, but don't expect a story-rich FPS or something else that this game isn't. The negative reviews kept me from committing to this game when it was originally releaed, but the developers have really turned it into a game worth playing. Kudos Hello Games.

Оказалось,что это не так.Для меня TES это прежде всего мультиклассовость,тут такого нет.Выбираешь класс и не можешь к нему ничего добавить.Так меня разочаровал Neverwinter Online,то же произошло и с TES Online.К этому можно добавить маленькую карту,искусственное ограничение рюкзака(мизерное количество ячеек),малое разнообразие монстров(почти одинаковый набор в любой части острова),всего одна климатическая зона-джунгли.

This is another case of pre-Christmas-rushing-a-half-baked-game-out-the-door in the hope to earn a little extra cash to make the FY18 financial report look good. 

- Graphics are terrible until you find out from some obscure thread that, unless you have the latest drivers, the game will default to the lowest graphics settings. Once you fix that, water is still be rendered in a pre-2000's fashion (Flat surface), making you long for the Game’s predecessor and its vibrant, living landscapes. 

- Abysmal communication from the devs/publisher: The means are all there – They could have warned users about the driver issue with that launch screen ticker, or maybe stickied a thread in the forums. Instead you only find some vague attempts of “It must be you” with links to demo videos and such. The latest post says that they plan to release some fixes to game-breaking bugs in the “next couple of weeks”, which, after a short glance at the calendar, translates to “2019”

- Crashes every now and then (and, apparently, I'm among the lucky ones). This is annoying, as you will usually be respawned outside the mission area when reloading. 

- The characters are simply ugly, one-dimensional and forgettable (Even in consideration of this being a Just Cause game). The story is lifted straight form some GI Joe episode. Humor has been reduced and downgraded to ground level, and struggles to take off, a bit like a drunk pelican. JC3 had gotten us used to something else. 

- The user interface is an absolute mess to the point you constantly flip through pages and tabs trying to get to the one that will let you do what you need. The predecessors managed to keep it simple, so why did they not keep to that?

It is obvious why they slapped a nasty DRM system on this: They anticipated the backlash and took some precautions to still get that crucial initial revenue. Ironically, that might be one of the few positives, as otherwise, this would clearly spell the end of a beloved franchise.

WATCH DOGS 2
A continuação de um jogo que foi muito hypado e não entregou o suficiente e com vários bugs.

A sequência da franquia realmente é o que o primeiro deveria ter sido, o jogo é muito divertido, com uma cidade bem viva e cheia de coisas pra fazer, tanto as missões principais e secundarias são extremamente prazerosas de se fazer, a adição do drone e as novas coisas para hackiar torna o jogo bem mais interessante e com diferentes modos de passar uma missão.

A história é boa porem simples, leva tudo pro lado da comedia e com alguns assuntos polêmicos.

Em relação à otimização do jogo, comprei ele depois de 6 meses que tinha lançado então não tive nenhum problema com travamentos ou mal otimização (coisa que o primeiro foi muito criticado)

Watch Dogs 2 vale a pena, jogo divertido, com gráfico muito bonito e com uma jogabilidade ótima

作为一部小品级别赛博朋克作品，va11对我而言是十分惊艳的。我看过不少赛博朋克小说和影视作品，但是能在碎片化的我的时间给我一个不算割裂体验的赛博朋克作品还是要数va11。

无论是《神经浪游者》还是《副本》还是《攻壳机动队》亦或是《银翼杀手》都很难满足我的碎片化需求（即很久以后“断片儿”了续不上剧情的割裂感）。

诚然以上作品绝对是十分优秀的赛博朋克作品，但是如果你也是和我一样的很难或者没机会一次性长时间体验一部作品的人的话，va11绝对是你入门赛博朋克的不二之选。
（顺便安利一下《红弦俱乐部》，也是十分优秀的赛博朋克游戏）

Fazit nach einem kompletten Durchspielen und ja, ich musste meine erste Rezension "überarbeiten".
Es ist schlicht und einfach langweilig. Ich war auch einer der Writing-Bulls Lets Plays begeistert gesehen habe. Dort ging es mir auch schon so, dass ich manchmal zweifelte. Doch nun ist es klar. Man kann Forschen und etwas bauen. Muss schauen, dass die Kohle passt und immer und immer wieder durch den Stadtrat peitschen. Das ist ziemlich öde.
Ich gebe zu, die ersten 2-3 Spielstunden machte es wirklich Spaß und die Idee sehr gut.
Aber nun bin ziemlich enttäuscht, weil es keine Langzeitmotivation mit sich bringt.
Daher meine Empfehlung von ja auf nein.
Es ist einfach nicht klar, wieso die Industrie dauernd wieder mehr Bereiche braucht und teilweise verstehe ich die Reaktionen der Parteien nicht. Opposition gibt es so gut wie keine und 95% der Anträge laufen locker durch solange man Geld auf dem Konto hat.

I almost cant recommend this game enough, its got a great story, well made characters, an amazing living world filled to the brim with unique monsters large and small, and an incredible combat system unlike any other RPG I've seen. 

While I am new to the Monster Hunter series, I think that this game really encapsulates the feeling of being a hunter and tracking monsters through a living breathing world like no other monster hunter game has. Tracking monsters footprints through a forest filled with predators, tactically using the environment to your advantage with boulders, landslides, vines, etc. Learning different monsters habits, what other monsters they don't get along with, where their nests are. It really feels like you are the hunter.

The weapon system In Monster Hunter World Iceborne is an amazingly fun way to add variety to the gameplay. At the start of the game you are told to choose one from fourteen different weapons which you can switch whenever you'd like to. Each of the fourteen different weapon types are very unique but all have a certain flow to them that makes it fun to play no matter which weapon you choose to play. Weapons in this game can be difficult to learn but when learned they make for some truly satisfying fighting. Aside from weapons themselves, the actual fighting in Monster Hunter World Iceborne has some very unique mechanics like mounting, using the clutch claw, breaking parts of the monster clean off, knocking out the monster by hitting it in its head, some of which are very weapon specific but others like the clutch claw arent, now to talk about clutch claw everyone's favourite. Clutch claw is a mechanic that was added with the Iceborne DLC Expansion which allows you to grapple onto a monster and do a variety of different attacks, the first attack you can do is your basic light attack which when completed tenderises the part of the monster that you attacked for 3 minutes which allows you to do more damage if you hit that part, the other main thing you can do while clutch clawed is if you are on the monsters head, you can turn the monster around up to three times before it becomes enraged and unable to be turned around anymore. If you can manage to get the monster to be facing a wall while clutch clawed onto their head, you can perform a flinch shot which uses all of your loaded slinger ammo and makes the monster run in a direction and if they hit said wall, they will get knocked down. The controversy from this mechanic comes from the tenderising part, since this mechanic was added they had to balance it somehow and the way they did that was increasing monsters health making it so you are more or less forced to use the clutch claw or else the fights take way too long. I for one am actually a fan of the tenderising mechanic, I think it adds another layer of strategy into the fights but I do see the reason its hated.

Anyways this was far too long a review. Overall this game along with the Iceborne DLC is a great experience for everyone.

Итак, поиграв в KCD и пройдя полностью сюжетку и пару историй из DLC, могу назвать KCD очень добротной игрушкой. Пожалуй, я бы назвал её лучшей среди всех средневековых адвенчур и RPG, если бы не некоторые "но", о которых речь пойдет ниже.
Перейдем к плюсам:
1) Сюжет. В целом он достаточно вменяем. У гг есть мотивация, история, отдельные моменты, связанные с проявлением его характера и ставящие нас, игроков, перед выбором: мы хотим "плохого парня Индро" или "рыцаря в сияющих доспехах". Есть, как по мне, некоторые недочеты, вроде достаточно скудной истории приемного отца гг (почему же он пошел на такой шаг, как отреагировала на это мать Индро), нет какого-то логического завершения истории Индро-бастарда (всё-таки это достаточно широко открытый конец, наш собственный отец не желает нас признать после всего, что мы с ним прошли, и соответственно - нет какого-то морального удовлетворения от неожиданного обретения родни. Я бы на месте Индро обиделся). Возможно я несколько цепляюсь, но мне кажется пару-тройку сюжетных моментов можно было бы сделать чуть глубже.
2) Графика и сеттинг. За неделю до первого открытия игры я ездил на дачу на майские праздники. Дача в обычной деревушке: идешь проселочной дорогой до озера, а вокруг поля с различным цветами. Запустив KCD, я вдруг очень ясно стал ассоциировать картинку на экране c недавними воспоминаниями из деревни. Серьезно, идешь по проселочной дороге, вытоптанной колеями от колес авто (а тогда от колес телег и коней всадников), видишь залитые лужицами выбоины, по обоим сторонам растет ромашка, крапива и календула. Всё это очень знакомо и легко сравнимо с реальными вещами, хорошо ассоциируется. Это мелочи, но именно они наполняют песочницу игры живостью. Не говоря уже о деревнях, замках, городе - они вообще сделаны прекрасно, в них и ощущаешь себя как в настоящем средневековье. В общем, с визуальной стороны игра сделана хорошо, а также добротно наполнена в плане окружения.
3) Боевая система. Я впервые столкнулся с подобной боевкой. Первый раз, подравшись с кем-то по дороге на мечах, я был в неприятном удивлении: не, ну чо этот бандит парирует все мои удары, что это за звезда на экране, как бить, как защищаться? Позже, по ходу игры разобравшись с нападением и защитой, а также постреляв из лука, я вынес для себя, что данная система боя однозначно стоит в списке лучших если не первым, то вторым номером. Как мы привыкли в обычных РПГ: мы выбираем противника, бьем его, он либо парирует/блокирует удар, либо уклоняется и уже атакует нас, а мы нажимаем блок/поднять щит. В KDC в принципе нет постоянного блока, нужно думать о том, как защититься, с какой стороны ударить, как среагировать, а противник после парирования твоего удара может тебя контратаковать спец. приемами, как впрочем и мы его. Это действительно реальный бой, где нужно думать над тактикой. Можно взять противника в клинч и оттолкнуть его, нанося затем удары на дезориентированного бойца, можно тупо лупить по его мечу своим, чтобы он устал отражать твои удары и начал их пропускать, можно использовать связки. Правда, это наложило на систему боя определенный небольшой минус - почти никто из противников не атаковал меня первым, я почти всегда начинал мутузить его первым номером. Но в целом я вынес очень положительный опыт сражений из игры. Читал жалобы от других игроков, что система плоха. По началу, как уже сказано, я тоже так думал, но теперь понимаю, что она просто непривычна для многих. Однако пообвыкнув, она хорошо себя показывает.
4) Мини-игра в алхимию. Хорошо продумана, требует концентрации и соблюдения порядка приготовления. До KCD часто играл в WoW, ггде чтобы приготовить зелье, нужно собрать реагенты и нажать кнопочку создать. В KCD ты должен каждое зелье сварить самостоятельно, четко следуя рецепту, и лишь после достижения выского уровня зельеварения ты можешь автоматически готовить склянки.
Теперь к минусам, куда же без них.
1) Баги. Куда же без них (2). Некоторые неписи говорят мне: иди воооон на ту опушку леса, я туда приду/буду тебя ждать в полночь, ты спишь, идешь туда, приходишь ииии... никого нет. Чувствуешь себя Траволтой из известной гифки. Лечится загрузкой чек поинта, но дико бесило, особенно в первые часы игры. Был квест с отловом трех женщин, которые, накурившись и обмазавшись богемским спайсом, решили вызвать дьявола, и их находят местные дровосеки в разгар веселья, к которому присоединяется наш герой. Как я потом узнал по сюжету, можно убить было либо мужиков с топорами, либо помешавшихся баб. В игре, сколько бы раз я не перезагружался, бабы от меня убегали аки богемские Усэйн Болтки. Приходилось убивать дровосеков, а это совсем не понравилось местному населению. 
2) Недочеты окружения. Еду я такой сияющий рыцарь по большой дороге в Ратае, у меня доспех бренчит, конь силен и быстр, меч наточен. Вдруг вижу половцев. Я достаю из широких кольчужных наножников меч и мчусь на супостата, он вот он, только через кусты проехать, и... ударяюсь в эти самые кусты. Warhorse, вы серьезно? Неинтерактивная растительность в 2018 году? Я понимаю, раз реализм, то пусть сквозь кусты можно было бы проехать и пройти, получив немного ссадин, но это кусты (!)? а не стенка. К некоторым травам, которые можно собрать, можно подойти, отплясав как цыган вокруг неё, потому что если зайти с севера к ней, а не с юга, ты не мог её собрать, даже если она прям под ногами растет. В общем, такие моменты злили. Некритично, но неприятно.
3) Общая система оптимизации. Просадки ФПС и подфризивания игры. Даже на мощных машинах игрушка лагает, и это не лечится опусканием графики даже на самое дно. 
4) Некоторые недочеты с балансировкой оружием. По мне, так самой простой шипастой дубинкой (не говоря уже о серьезных и дорогих булавах и моргенштернах) можно забить любого бронетанкового рыцаря. Мечом тоже можно, но им куда сложнее. Создается впечатление о недостаточной проработанности вопросов баланса вооружения. Но это, опять же некритично.
5) Система сохранений. Абсолютно непонятно, зачем было вводить в игру дополнительную склянку для сохранений. Рецепт на неё известен с самого начала, ингридиенты можно нафармить либо купить/стырить у тороговца. Серьезно, никакого реализма в плане сохранений и нет. Просто не то чтобы палка, скорее ветка в колесо игрового процесса. И опять же - некритично.
_______________________
В целом, плюсы как по мне, явно значительные и куда явнее перевешивают минусы. С нетерпением жду вторую часть, пока заканчиваю доигрывать аддоны. На мой взгляд, игра заслуживает оценку 8-8.5 из 10.
Ну так-то багов много, ну вы сами вкурсе.. Но я просто люблю убивать!

I love this game. It's like what Battlefield USED to be before it turned into Call of Dooty with vehicles (back when it was PC only). 

Anyway, I travel all over the country for work. Sometimes I go to places with no internet, or even worse, I go somewhere with internet that is SO BAD, I would rather have no internet...It's a thing. This game is PERFECT for those times. 

It's also perfect if you just want to fuck around. Give everybody slingshots and run around with a shotgun. This game is anything you want it to be and it's only going to get better. Best part is, it can NEVER DIE because BOTS! You will ALWAYS have as many "players" as you want.

真的很萌！这是第一眼的反应，加上这么有农场风格的BGM，一边探寻整个世界，一边喂养史莱姆，一边种植果树。玩着挺惬意的。
整个游戏世界就目前来说并不大，但是我看到有许多封锁的道路，而且还有些隐藏的道路，说不定正式游戏会挺大的。游戏玩法上来说，也是常见的牧场游戏玩法，养殖卖生产物然后用钱来升级农场或者自身，但是整个游戏并没有一个明确的目标，虽然有任务系统但是感觉没什么用，任务缴纳的物品和奖励物品比较一下感觉太不值，或许正式游戏会添加更有趣的任务？或者添加更多的系统让游戏玩起来和沙盒游戏一样?游戏中每个史莱姆都有不同的生活习性，通过结合还可以造出有双重特性的大史莱姆(用大史莱姆再去结合的话会发生非常好玩的事情)，但是目前来说史莱姆种类挺少的，还有一种没有添加进游戏但是在开始菜单能看到的绿史莱姆呢？升级系统和玩法方面的话花样也不是太多，希望正式游戏能添加更多的元素吧。
Early Access的话大概2小时就能全玩到了，比如我这样5小时的话基本都是强迫症每种史莱姆组合都养了一圈。目前价格的话国区以外就HB的价格来说是20刀，国区60元，还是有点贵的，毕竟是测试版本，想入的话也可以等正式版，说不定正式版的时候就打折了呢？

Negitaves:

Está chulo, aunque el online apesta un poco a uretra.

Es un juego muy brutal y bastante injusto, pero, después de todo, ese es el aspecto principal de este juego (aunque no es Circle of the Moon así que por ello no está tan mal). En vez de ser muy negativo, vamos a lo bueno:

*Gráficos y modelos que realmente crean una atmósfera que crea un mundo deprimente y oscuro.
*Muchas cosas que coleccionar, muchísima customización.
*Bastante exploración.
*Jefes épicos, gigantes e hiper kaijus que se te harán icónicos por la partida.
*Un viaje épico
*Sentirte cada vez más poderoso en un juego difícil (como Terraria).
*Es un juego bastante largo, pero no excesivamente grande ni pesado.

Lo malo del juego es que la dificultad no viene por "dificultad", sino por aspectos muy molestos y pesados en las partidas que te echarás una y otra vez de las veces que mueres. Es un poco "Majora's Mask", en el sentido de que hace falta muchísima atención e información muy específica para conseguir algunas cosas o saber lo que hacer en el juego y entender la historia. Te castiga mucho los movimientos que haces erróneos y otras cosas que te harán querer mutilarte los huevos.

Y este juego no se centra específicamente en la historia, e incluso algunas partes de la Lore son algo raras de entender. No entraré mucho en detalle.

[b] Esto te lo puedes saltar si no vas a jugar online. [/b]

La parte online del juego es terrible por otra parte, aunque se puede desactivar. Hay una especie de cooperativo muy específico de hacer y que es más como una "ayuda rápida que te dan los compañeros" que una campaña multiplayer en sí. La comunidad es bastante dedicada a este juego, por lo que deberías prepararte para enfrentarte con guerreros profesionales del club de BuRlaS gRaciOsaS xD y saber que jugarán muy pasivos, haciendo que cada movimiento tuyo te lleve a la muerte. Ah, y si piensas que no puedes escapar de ellos, literalmente te pueden invadir tu "dimensión" del juego. En resúmen:

Te vienen ochocientos caballeros vestidos de transexuales para matarte con un megacuchillo electrificado que te da y te daña a pesar de que el modelo del arma no te haya ni atravesado. 

[b]Esto no te lo puedes saltar tanto[/b]

+ Por suerte, creo que hay una forma de hacer que estos invasores sean bots y que te dropeen cosas únicas (que deberían dártelas en el juego offline pero bueno...) con un online como "casi real".

Conclusión: mientras sabes en lo que te metas, puede ser una experiencia épica e icónica o un simulador de estrés medieval.

If you want my honest opinon i had a good bit of fun bu this game has too many problems. To sum it up the story mode is great and i would suggest it to anyone but the online mode is aids. With the majority of my hours being in online iv'e definitely had my fair bit of fun but still wouldn't suggest it to new players. The online mode is filled with toxic players who's only goal is to ruin your day and this is this least of its problems. Everytime you go into a loading screen there is a chance you get softlocked and have to restart the game. This means everytime this happens you have to wait almost 10 minutes for your game to start up again and becomes a huge pain in the ass. This is my last point and the biggest problem in the online, money. The way you make money in online takes way too long and that only pushes you to buy extremely overpriced shark cards. Not only this but because of all of the toxic people playing the game every time you even make an attempt at making money you end up getting killed by a tryhard on an opressor pushing you more towards buying these shark cards. Overall, if you're planning on playing this game for the online I would suggest not doing it because it will suck up either your wallet or your mental health. Whichever comes first.

88 Stunden im Spiel. Also ja, ich hatte Spaß. Also kommt hier ein Review: 

Da in jeder Siedlung oder Höhlen etwas zu entdecken gibt kommt der/die Spieler*in voll auf seine/ihre kosten. Besonders im Multiplayer Modus mit Freunden macht das Spiel Spaß. das Bausystem ist zwar etwas "frickelig" aber dafür finde ich das crafting Menü, nach etwas Eingewöhnung, sehr gut.   
Es lässt sich daher sagen, dass der Einstieg sehr einfach ist es danach aber eher grindlastig wird

Grafisch überzeugt The Forest durch viele Details, dichte Flora und Fauna, sowie eine stimmungsvolle Beleuchtung. Durch den Tageszeiten-Zyklus wird nachts alles außerdem stockdunkel. Dann kommt die Geräuschkulisse besonders zur Geltung, jedes Rascheln, jedes Knacken jagt mir Schauer über den Rücken. Allerdings schwächeln all zu häufig die Texturen, das UI ist nicht immer auf dem Posten, die Physik spielt manchmal verrückt und lässt Gegenstände durch die Luft fliegen. Aber wie hier offenes und geführtes Gameplay zusammenkommen, das ist den Preis allein schon wert.

Der grundlegende Zyklus besteht aus dem Bau eines Lagers und Verteidigungsanlagen sowie Ausrüstung und anderen Mitteln zur Versorgung und anschließenden Expeditionen ins Umland und die Höhlensysteme darunter.

The Forest verfügt über eine tiefgehende Handlung (wenn man sich denn die mühe macht und alle Fotos, Videos genau ansieht und auch die Dokumente die zu finden sind liest) mit überraschenden Wendungen samt Entscheidungen und sogar zwei möglichen Enden.

Ich Empfehlen dieses Spiel allen die in ihrem Survival Game nicht nur Stumpf ums Überleben kämpfen wollen.

I bought a rig that could finally run this smoothly and yeah I enjoy it, I suck at it but I enjoy it.

My issues with this title have mostly been addressed however while the game looks great runs fairly well (it makes my rig very toasty though) and is smooth to play there are many hackers, the amount of times I've been killed by snaplock aimbots or people with unlimited health is too damn high. Also the micro-transactions are a bit lame. My game freezes occasionally loading up which sucks but hey it is what it is.

The game is fun as a Battle Royale. I haven't won games in like 600 hours though, can't tell if I suck or other people are jut sweaty good.

At the time of writing I have 360 hours in game, this game is addictive as hell and really inspires that just one more try mentality, as a multiplayer game it doesn't have a set way to play it and therefore offers tonnes of replayability and is a pretty beautiful game. (Especially if you use reshade). My only issue is that I had to purchase an SSD to play the game as the game suffers from a memory leak currently where old hard drives that spin at less than 7400 RPM can't process the game files fast enough to implement the game effectively so if you are buying this game for now at least install it on an SSD

I can almost never afford to buy a brand new game, and this is no exception to that rule. As an avid sci-fi fan of literature and film, I was excited for this game when it was first announced. The screenshots coming out of it looked freaking amazing and something that would make even Wayne Douglas Barlowe jealous. After two years of waiting I finally got the game. I tried it first on Survival. I died 3 times in about as many minutes... So I switched to normal to learn how to play and get into the game. After 7 hours of play I finally made it out of the orignal system. I'm a bit nervous of what kind of grind for resources may await me, but at the same time I'm really enjoying it. I found a humid planet that doesn't sap all my survival resources like crazy and I can explore to find things. 

Anyways, A+ grade from me at this point.

Après tout ce que l'on a pu lire et entendre, je me devais d'apporter mon avis très positif.
Alors oui, NMS n'est clairement pas un jeu pour tout le monde, de la même façon qu'un MINECRAFT a peu de chance de plaire à des fans de FPS et autre GTA.
Mais clairement, NMS peut emmener le joueur dans des horizons nouveaux.
J'ai déjà passé 25 heures dans ce jeu, et franchement, je ne sais pas comment en décrocher tellement l'envie d'y jouer est forte.
Je n'avais plus connu une telle expérience depuis des lustres. Je joue depuis 37 ans (j'en ai 47), et j'ai passé un nombre incalculable d'heures sur tous les DOOM, COD et en dernier sur SKYRIM (450 heures pour ce dernier) et je sais quand un jeu est marquant.
Et NMS fait partie de ces jeux-là.

Тем не менее, на сегодняшний день лучший градостроительный симулятор. 
Множество места для застройки города, поддержка модов и ассетов в мастерской стима, нормальная транспортная система позволяют построить город мечты! 
Автобусы, трамваи, метро, поезда, самолеты, порт.
Игра затягивает хоть и плохо оптимизирована  ( ВОЗМОЖНО ИЗ ЗА МОДОВ И ОБЪЕКТОВ ИЗ МАСТЕРСКОЙ) а так без модов чистая игра говорят очень хорошо оптимизирована и не зависает, у меня модов и обьектов на 15 страниц поэтому иногда фпс падает до 3-5 кадров, да и железо не топовое, но даже при 5 фпс играть все равно комфортно.
Хорошие красочные DLC которые выходят примерно каждые 7-8 месяцев, но разработчики добавляют некоторые объекты или новые возможности для игры в день выхода DLC бесплатно - остальные плюшки игрок получит если он купит DLC в среднем стоит 300-350 рублей как и сама игра. 
Так же иногда разработчики добавляют абсолютно бесплатно новые возможности в игру, пару дней назад добавили - набережные, каналы, возможность изменять рельеф и т.д

Если вы любитель градостроительных симуляторов и стратегий, ОЧЕНЬ СОВЕТУЮ!
SImCity отдыхает, EA делает игры на один день, да и цены большие ставят, исключения SIMS 3 - в него могу долго играть довольно долго. 
Эта игра прославилась в день выхода - каждый день в нее играет от 3 до 11 тысяч человек.
Просто советую вам преобрести эту игру и все на данный момент для нее дополнения, не пожалеете в крайнем случае, сделает возврат средств, благо стим это позволят.
Уверен у игры большое будущее, будет еще много DLC, патчей и т.д.
Если все таки будете играть - то ставьте фаил подкачки на тот диск на котором игра чем больше тем лучше, ибо игра очень требовательна в оперативной памяти особенно при большом количестве населения, модов и объектов с мастерской.
Да и большое количество DLC в будущем.

This is probably the worst game I've ever played. It does so much right as a battle royal, but does so much more wrong as it too. You will land, and probably take 20 minutes (if you don't die yet) just to find a shitty pistol. If you're lucky, you have 2 amazing choices to put into your inventory, an AK, and an M16. Every other gun practically doesn't exist, btw ammo not included.
Next, the death cam is a great feature to see how your enemy hacked, I mean, out played you. Same thing. The death cam will either show you, that you were exposaed even though you were clearly behind cover, and it'll also show you how an enemy can have the aim of Helen Keller with a wii remote and still somehow clean you up. Even better, it'll show 7 out 8 times how an enemy will instant snap to you (1 out of the 7 will be legit). I can't wait till a proper vac secure system will finally be mentioned at HQ.
Third, I'd like to point out, I absolutely detest the sand map, I think it shouldn't have ever been thought of. I personally prefer the grassy map, because I can actually find cover, and die less often. I think to sort this out for player like me, there should've been an option from day 1 of sand map, to choose to queue up for either one or a random playlist. I think that the corporation should've taken this into account.
Fourth I'd like to say what makes this game so good yet so terribly fucking awful, is its community. Streamers like Shroud, and Dr. Disrespect will show you how fun it can be, and how its like to be good. However its the top tier that prevents players from having fun. Because when you die in every gun fight to someone better, how can you improve? The players will sometimes go out of their way just to make sure you have a miserable time that match. I think a way to overcome skill gaps, is to incorporate a form of training game mode so players can practice aim and/or maneuverability. This should've been predicted and implemented long ago.
What really pisses me off about this game, is that the developers refuse to offer anything that can make this game better, and I enjoy it sometimes even though I've yet to win on PC, I can still find some fun at times. I however think, for now, this game is a dissapointment, and should be given some redux before anyone new thinks about purchasing it.

Edit: "You've played an additional 33 hours, would you recommend this game to other players?" Fuck no, total fucking bullshit game don't waste your money

Backstory on my experince...

This is the first game I ever owned on Steam and luckily, it left a good impression on me. When I first started playing, I didn't know how to do anything, and this was back when it was fairly new. So there wasn't a very big wiki to read. I played it a little bit every day until I made a castle out of stone bricks and wood. Then I stopped playing for a year...

When I met some new friends, one of the first games we played together was Terraria. It was a blast! The best part about playing with friends is that I learned how to progress and I became a fairly good player. It even got to the point where I taught THEM how to play.

Now days, I usually play with friends cause I find that to be the best way to enjoy the game to its fullest.

In the end, i'd give this game about a 9.8/10...

It's a fun, relaxing, but difficult game that I'd recommend to play with your friends...
Definitely a unique scary game, but it would be much better with more story and in-game guidance. It tends to get repetitive pretty quickly.

Overall: Loved it! The music is great and gameplay is very smooth. It even runs on my terrible 2005 Dell Desktop! Terraria is very challenging. There are lots of unique bosses, each with their own strategy to beat. There is so much to do! From mining to obtain better weapons and ore, to braving the underworld to collect even more loot, Terraria is awesome!
However, it isn't perfect. My main complaint is that it is very complex with little to no explainations. I believe that they have integrated a tutorial, but it only scratches the surface of what is possible in the game. There is so much to understand, and the average player will miss a lot. The community makes up for this, however. There is an overwhelming amount of tutorials, guides, and even full wikis based on the game that the community has put together.

Я не могу подобрать текст для описания этой игры, шедевр.

First of all the genre is cool, but this game is not.
Why? Because of all the horrible lag / network issues / performance / draw distances and pretty much every single subsystem of the game.
This whole game is 25% skill, 25% your hardware and the rest is 50% luck on not lagging during a fight.

Network issues are present in every single game. My fps is under 75 on an 1080TI@1440p, the graphics are dated and the effects terrible

Draw distance means that sometimes you see yourself surrounded by bushes, but the enemy sees you standing in the middle of a field, granting him a free wall hack

The game always glitches out, the driving of vehicles is terrible and you might die even by driving them

The devs no longer make efforts to improve the game, instead they filled it with microtransactions.

I used to love this game, hoping it would get better over time, but it's not, avoid at all costs.

Mano do céu esse é o jogo que mais me tocou na vida. Está marcado pra sempre. Se eu tivesse dinheiro eu fecharia meu braço só com tatuagens desse jogo. A ambientação, as músicas, a história, é tudo perfeito.

Little to nothing remains of the game I once loved so much. Where the first couple of assassins creed games (up to Black Flag) stayed true to their roots, both Origins and Odyssey did not. 

Odyssey is in many aspects a copy of Origins with a greek twist to it. Only difference is, the grinding is much more present, and so are the micro transactions. The game forces you to grind and level up, all whilst promoting permanent real world upgrades in the shop. 

To make matters worse, you're not even part of the Assassins anymore. No creed, no hidden blade. (and no shields wtf? How can you be spartan without a shield?). The combat mechanics feel sluggish and half-assed.



 I got this game for about €25. Fair enough.

1100 часов расслабона)
И так, я думаю кому как не мне можно точно описать все плюсы и минусы
Плюсы
-Регулярно выходят обновления, но, багов полно
-Картинка, хоть и 2012 год, но это просто красиво, словами не описать пейзажи, которых я уже насмотрелся за эти 1130 часов
-Сам процесс, от которого удовольствия вы получите море, если учитывать то что весь процесс, это крутить баранку.
-Хороший парк грузовиков и прицепов, но не идеальный.
-Много тюнинга, как игрового, так и стороннего
-Мастерская стим, как и поддержка сторонних модов, делают из этой игры конфетку.
-Достаточно большая карта
-Разнообразие грузов, с модами их вообще море

Минусов у игры я не нашёл, есть придирки.
-Открыта почти вся карта, куплены все гаражи, но, работать некому, 680 водителем максимум, и это с модом, без мода ещё меньше
-Как уже говорил, багов хватает
-Каждый грузовик и прицеп нужно ставить на конкретное место в окошке, то есть нажал "купить", открывается окно, в какой слот его поставить, и так с каждым грузовиком/прицепом/человеком, и знали бы вы, как же ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ывает, особенной когда наполняешь несколько гаражей, или больше.
Был как то у меня момент, когда я захотел поменять весь автопарк, ушло больше 3 часов.
Скажите мне что я больной, я знаю) 
-УЖАСНО ТУПЫЕ БОТЫ, не было ни одно рейса, что бы на встречку на двухполосной дороге прямо передо мной не высунулся какой нибудь ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥н, я уже на автомате на круизе их объезжаю по обочине, это как из примера.
Поведение ботов - на симулятор ни разу не похоже, медленные и тупые, никакого уважения, никакой лояльности как в жизни.
И сюда же, нереалистичный трафик, да есть моды, но они особо проблему не решают. 
-Физика, отдельный разговор. Не знаю, катались ли разработчики на грузовиках, но физика в игре, не разу не реалистичная
Очень жёсткая подвеска и тд. Пофиксить можно модом, но пока что подходящего мне не нашёл.
-Не скажу что недостаток, но, почему бы не дать выбор игроку выбор, на какой сложности экономики ему играть.
-Ценообразование как траков, так и прицепов, и сюда же зарплаты водителям и обслуживание грузовиков, цены не реалистичные
-Скудный автопарк, хоть и фиксится модами, но всё же, приятнее когда машины лецензированные, и сделаны разработчиками игры. Нет новинок, последне что добавлено, это Scania S. На этом новинки в игре закончились.
-Карта с модами хоть и большая, но слишком сжато всё получается, лечится модами, которыйх просто с горкой.
-НЕ скажу опять же что недостаток, но, у меня в наличии 680 машин, и казалось бы, встретить в рейсе машину из своего автопарка, нормальное дело, но нет, не встретишь.
-Заоблачные цены на DLC, мягко говоря, хорошо что хоть скидки есть.
-Отсутствие как таковой жизни на карте, от слова совсем, нет никого, ни людей, ни собак и тд.
-Если и идёт речь о симуляторе, то слишком простое управление компанией, нет его, купил гараж, купил траки, посадил на них людей и всё, забыл. В жизни так не прокатит. Нет отпусков у водителей. Машины не бьются, не простаивают и тд.
Так же не оплачиваешь налоги, нет системы компании. Есть грузовик, водитель и гараж, посадил и поехал. Платишь только за ремонт трака, солярка, ну и зп соответственно.
-Отсутствие смены сезонов года, бесконечное лето.
-Ужасная система ремонта и сервиса грузовика и прицепов. Нет как такогого понятия "замена", то есть, резина у тебя на тягаче износилась на 50%, ты едешь в сервис, и нажимаешь ремонт, всё, она новая, в жизни бы так да ?
Нет ремонта подвески, нет ремонта навесного оборудования двигателя, ничего нет.
Чисто ремонт двигателя, коробки, кабины и резины.
Нет понятия ремонт, на который уйдёт время, ты за секнуду просто всё починил и поехал дальше.
-Дороги везде идеальные, так бы в жизни.
Но все знают, что даже в Европе есть плохие дороги.
-Нет системы случайных событий, вернее она есть, но это 50% от того что я бы хотел видеть. То есть, ты едешь, и перед тобой может грузовик сложиться например, или притёрся там кто нибудь, вызов полиции и тд, нет, забудь. Будешь видеть только как на обочине стоит кто то сломанный. Или как тупые боты просто врезались в друг друга, постояли на аварийке 3 секунды, и поехали дальше.
-НЕТ СИСТЕМЫ ПОВРЕЖДЕНИЙ, что очень печально.
Нет системы износа внешнего, то есть, купил ты себе трак, откатал на нём миллион км, а он как новый, никаких сколов и тд
Так же отсутствует система грязи. Ваш трак вечно чистый, в любую погоду и месте где вы едете.
-Нет случайных поломок в пути. Хотелось бы например что бы: покрышка например лопнула, и в этом духе.
-Дурацкая система подбора персонала, эти категории и уровень, это бред.
Считаю что должны быть показатели стажа, безаварийное вождение и тд.
-Нет системы буушных траков и прицепов, что очень печально.

И итог-----------

O Jogo se passa em um pós inverno nuclear, onde tudo e quase todos foram destruídos, porém o seu personagem e sua família conseguiram ir para um abrigo onde foram congelados. Após muitos anos você acorda e sua mulher foi assassinada e seu filho roubado. 
O mundo é totalmente aberto, o que te limita é a dificuldade dos inimigos em certos lugares onde é hit kill. Você pode evoluir e especializar seu personagem como quiser, Tem uma boa quantidade de armas.
A estoria é boa, traz personagens marcantes, tem muita submissão para fazer e você pode fazer quase tudo..... Não estou falando de Skyrim ... é Fallout.

It is hard to say much, that hasn't already been said. Simply put, a gaming tour de force. Beautifully crafted world with an engaging story. I am not really an RPG player by nature, but this one pulled me in enough to play through it twice.

Pros:
+Great story - a lot of depth and decisions do have a feel of shaping the world.
+Presentation - world is vivid, varied, and in general excellently fleshed out.
+Value - base game itself is quite long and the DLC add even more for a reasonable price

Cons:
-Combat is a little dull.

If you want an open world RPG with a lengthy well written story, this is a great choice. While there are little stumbles here and there (my biggest gripe being combat is sort of boring) the final project is truly remarkable. The game scales quite well too, if you have a high HZ monitor and a good graphics card, well you are in for a real visual treat.

I was more than excited for Half-Life: Alyx. I had never seen a Half-Life game release while also being a fan or even knowing of the series. I got the Orange Box as a gift to play Portal, but you know that I just HAD to play that 'shooter' game when I was never allowed to play one before. I was stunned. I see it as I was playing it as if it had just came out, because I didn't really know of anything else. Needless to say, ever since I finished Episode 2 eight years ago, I've always had childish fantasies of a followup. Half-Life: Alyx has exceeded the expectations that I could have ever possibly dreamed up. I got the same feeling I got when I played HL2 eight years ago, which is absolute awe and wonder. This game is an absolute masterpiece, and is fitting of both the Half-Life name and the Valve logo. The graphics and environment are absolutely full to the brim with detail and care. The story is something to die for, and the gameplay is awesome. The game is perfect. I'm looking forward to Valve's next game.

### sehr wenig stunden für eine Review gespielt? Nein, die Titel wurden meist auf anderen Plattformen/Accounts ausgibig getestet ###

Zusammenfassung:

Grafik		+
Story		        +-
Syncro		++
Gameplay	        +

Details:

Ich widme mich diesem Spiel bewusst erst jetzt. (Februar 2014)
Der Hype, der um das Game gemacht wurde, war mich mehr als abschreckend. Nun also eine kleine Review:

Was wohl der haupt-"nicht-kauf“-grund der meisten Leute ist und war, welche sich für das Spiel interessierten, ist der grafik-styl/Look. Ich muss gestehen, dass es mir zu Anfang auch so ging, jedoch wurde ich schnell eines besseren belehrt! Nach den ersten 30 min fällt er einem nicht mehr auf oder anders gesagt alles ist in sich stimmig und macht die Spielwelt dadurch glaubhaft. Zudem kann ich die Entscheidung im Nachhinein auch für die Hardwareanforderungen gut heißen, da das Spiel durchgängig flüssig (auf modernen Systemen (und ich rede nicht von unter 60fps oder gar 30fps)) läuft. Dies wäre wohl mit einer anderen Engine nur schwer machbar gewesen.

Der nächste Punkt ist die Story. Dazu muss ich sagen, dass sich die Arkane Studios in meinen Augen ein Eigentor geschossen haben. Die Gesichter wurden so gut auf ihre Rolle im Spiel hin modelliert, sodass man von Anfang an merkt, dass etwas nicht stimmt. Nichtsdestotrotz ist die Story sehr schön erzählt, was auch der sehr guten DEUTSCHEN Syncro zu schulden ist! Wer jedoch die ganze Geschichte erleben will und wirklich alle sich stellenden fragen geklärt haben will, sollte zur GOTY greifen.

Zum eigentlichen Gameplay: mir ist aufgefallen das man, wenn man erst einmal einen für seine Spielweise (stealth/fight) passende Combo der Spezialkräfte gefunden hat immer nach diesem Schema vor geht und 90 % des Spiels so durchzieht. In den restlichen 10 % kam es mir so vor, als ob der Entwickler mich zwingen wollte, diese eine Fähigkeit zu nutzen, da es sonst übertrieben aufwendig wurde voran zu kommen.

Bleibt zum Schluss zu sagen Dishonored macht spaß, weil es eben nicht nur fight/stealth/story/grafik ist, sondern eine sehr gute Mischung aus all dem.

A unique setting, a gripping story, sciency carnage! The first Bioshock was a masterpiece of setting and story, and Bioshock Infinite lives up to the expectations and exceeds them. The soundtrack is briliant in its subtlety, the action is fast paced no matter what your choice of killing is, and the scenery is BEAUTIFUL. The story is excellently written (if not confusing at points) and comes all together in a the perfect moment of clarity at the very end, and, true to the Bioshock name, the twist will floor you. This is the sort of game I'd be more than happy to erase my memory to rediscover again and again.

It is by no means as amazing as other MMOs. However I am currently giving it the benefit of the doubt as I make my way through it. I was an original founder of the game who paid prior to its reelase and was greatly dissapointed. However since it went F2P I've come back to try the game again. And this may be due to the smaller player base but the game appears to be running more smoothly which was my only real complaint to begin with. It's not perfect the large city I've visted still suffers from frame drops, but it is not the 5-7fps experience I had before. Now its at 60+ with drops to the 30s which isn't unplayable.

As I put more time into the game (at 1.1 hours of this review 4 hours of current time was just after initial release and I won't count that towards my reivew) I will update how I feel about it.

*Updated*
After playing the game for a bit longer, It was fun for a while. But there were a lot of later performance issues that came up, mostly with the really low draw distance, sometimes being as a low as a few feet in front of my character before something would pop up.

[h1]장점 [/h1]
+ 훌륭한 그래픽
+ 업그레이드 된 게임성
+ 전작보다 조금 더 커진 볼륨
+ 감동적인 한국어 더빙

[h1]단점 [/h1]
- 전작과 비슷한 스토리
- 수집 요소가 반복 플레이를 요구
- 게임 처음부터 끝까지 크게 변화가 없는 게임성

[h1]평점 [/h1]
8/10

게임성 8/10
스토리 7/10
영상미 10/10 

[h1]안정적인 시리즈의 답습 [/h1]
리부트를 통해서 인상적이고 멋진 부활에 성공한 툼 레이더 리부트 시리즈의 두번째 작품이다. 전작에서 우연한 사고를 통해서 모험가로서 눈을 뜬 라라 크로프트가 이번 작품에는 성경에 언급되는 예언자 혹은 선지자라는 존재를 찾기 위해 모험을 하는 것이 이번 작품의 주 내용이다.

어드벤쳐 게임의 단골 소재로 등장하는 기독교의 성스러운 유물과 흔적을 찾는다는 점에서 제작진이 굉장히 안정적인 소재를 고른 것이 눈에 띈다. 다만 게임 초반의 신선했던 기독교 문화 유적에 대한 탐구가 끝나고 나서 게임 중반부에는 선지자의 뒤를 쫓는 트리니티 교단의 이야기만 주구장창 나오면서 기독교 유적과 문화에 대한 탐험보다는 게임에서 만든 세계관에 조금 더 집중하도록 유도하는 노력이 많이 비춰진다. 

개인 차이가 나는 부분이 있겠지만 아쉽게도 게임에서 진행되는 내러티브가 너무 진부하고 등장하는 캐릭터들도 단순하고 뻔해서 흥미롭지 못했다.

게임 플레이도 전작과 크게 달라지지 않았다. 역시나 이번에도 우연찮게 활을 첫 무기로 사용하게 되고 전작과 비슷한 퍼즐과 장애물을 건너며 진행한다. 물론 이번 작품만의 새로운 액션과 조작이 추가되기는 했으나 그 점들이 전작과 이 작품에 차별화를 주는 요소를 만들어주지는 않는다.

아이템을 업그레이드 하는 방법은 많이 달라졌는데 적이나 환경 오브젝트를 조사해서 수집해 부품을 모아서 아이템을 만든다. 노가다를 좋아하는 유저라면 여기저기 돌아다니며 모으는 재미가 있겠지만 게임 진행에 업그레이드가 꼭 필요한 게임이 아니다보니 스토리만 빨리 진행하고 싶다면 굳이 아이템 노가다를 할 필요는 없다.

게임에서 보여주는 영상미는 매우 훌륭하다. 오프닝 격인 설산과 시리아 장면은 물론이고 게임내내 등장하는 무대들도 모두 상당히 아름답게 잘 만들어졌다. 러시아 동토에서 무대가 펼쳐지지만 중간중간 다른 날씨의 환경을 보여주면서 지루함을 달래주는 것도 좋고 전작에서 비슷비슷했던 유적지는 이번에는 각기 다른 모습을 보여주는 것도 훌륭하다.

상당히 스케일이 커지긴 했지만 전체적으로 전작과 비교해서 조작감과 게임의 진행 흐름이 비슷하기 때문에 지루한 부분도 없지는 않다. 그러나 전작이나 이번 작품 모두 액션 어드벤쳐로서 높은 완성도와 재미를 보장하는 작품인 것은 분명하다. 게다가 이번 작품은 모든 음성이 한국어로 더빙되었고 더빙의 완성도도 매우 높은편이다.

전작을 재밌게 즐겼다면 반드시 해볼길 추천한다.

Factorio is a game where you're stranded on an alien planet and must build up a powerful industrial base culminating in a rocket to escape.
The good: gameplay which is niche but very fun. Challenges you and rewards thoughtful planning, but doesn't make itself unplayable if you mess up. Probably made me a better coder just because of how obvious it always is that 90% of my hassles are from not using best practices earlier.
The bad: If carefully thinking about how to route a giant network of conveyor belts to optimize production while leaving room for scalability isn't your idea of a good time, you will not enjoy this game. Also, while I understand why they needed to institute it to maintain challenge, the pollution system kind of feels like a punishment for playing the game as intended. I also have a few specific gripes about the pacing, like how the after-victory stuff is a kinda weird amount where it's not a long-term challenge but it's not an afterthought, and how a couple of things that would be really fun to play with aren't unlocked until you've proven you don't need them and there's not enough game left to really use them.
Final thoughts: The factory must grow to meet the needs of the growing factory.

It's been 15 years I last played Raven Shield, but R6 Siege really pays homage to the series and smells just like an R6 game should.

Matches are short and unforgiving. Be ready to die in different ways. But let's face it, terrorism and counter-terrorism are no nice guy business: gas, cluster charges, electric shocks.. you'll slow down and mow down the enemy any way you can.

80+ hours in and I really love this game.
Does it have bugs? - Yes but devs are working hard to fix everything!

The story is awesome and I really like the aspect of the kingdom management.
Of course some bugs may be frustrating but I would still highly recommend playing it. Once the devs fixed the bugs, it's definitely going to be a masterpiece in my opinion! :)

멀티플레이 생존게임으로선 재밌지만 반복요소가 너무 강하다.
초반에는 뗏목을 확장해가며 새로운곳을 찾아가보는 재미가 확실하게 있지만,
그 이후엔 컨텐츠의 부실함을 느끼게 된다.

섬들도 처음엔 기대를 하고 어떻게든 가 보려 하지만,
결국에는 구조는 다르지만 내용물은 같은 섬들의 반복이기에 재료를 얻기 위한 수단으로만 보게 된다.

스토리용 대형 맵들도 처음엔 신기하지만
해야 할 일은 결국 신호기용 좌표가 써있는 방에 들어갈 수 있도록
1회용 도구를 만들기위해 필요한 재료를 해당맵에서 찾아보기의 반복이다.

플레이어에게 위협이 될만한 적은 수중에선 딱 두종류에, 육지에선 네종류 정도로 매우 적다.
그만큼 위협적인 요소가 별로 없고, 생존을 위한 수분, 허기를 채우는게 처음에는 어렵지만,
게임 시작 후 2시간 정도만 지나면 거의 끝까지 뗏목에서 자급자족이 가능할 정도이다.

 단점이 꽤나 많은 게임이지만,
쉬어가는 느낌으로 친구와 천천히 즐긴다면 최소 8시간정도는 즐거운 경험을 하게 될것이고,
혼자서 한다고 하면 추천하지 않는게임.

作为一个0123456包括1复刻全打烂的人，对本作的期待颇高，没想到实际比我的期望值还要高许多许多！这几乎就是一个新游戏了，难得老卡有如此满满的诚意！
和456的体术战斗越肩视角不同，这作补给少，全靠躲，完全是老1代和2代（不开无限弹）的风格，久违的感觉。
画面，操作，音效，氛围，完全没得挑。剧情上看有些人说比较短，其实老2代差不多就是这样，一些调整的剧情，也不不觉得突兀。
要说槽点。。。人脸，人脸，人脸！从6代的颜值巅峰一下跌落到这个水平，有点。。。哈哈，估计是迎合欧美玩家的口味吧。看2RE和6代里雪莉的变化，不得不说G病毒其实是个整容神器。另外大G的造型有点萌萌哒。。。压迫感不如以前。

This is absolute, top-of-the-line, blunt as an atom bomb, more sharp than a piece of glass, bullshit.

So, the story begins last Thursday. I heard from a friend that this game was free and thought, hey, lets have some badass MMORPG action with a couple other friends. So I start the long and ardous download process. My broadband is quite terrible at downloads (2.5 Mbps average) so I waited, my horned helmet at the ready. Here we go, the download finally finished this Sunday morning. Fucking pure excitement. I wake up in the morning like a kid on Christmas and run to my computer and start up this game. Errors. Errors upon motherfucking errors. First it was an error around the lines of Hostname_something or other. Easy fix, I just installed the launcher directly through my steam files, no problem. Now, I thought that this would be it right? No. How fucking dare I think that it would go anywhere near right. So I started the launcher and I needed to download a patch. Pretty basic stuff right? 

Fuck. To. The. No

After waiting over a half hour for the download to complete, it gave me an error; error 209. So then I spent the 2.1 hours that I have spent "playing" the game getting angry and restarting downloads, trying in obvious vain to get the stupid piece of shit to work right. Eventually, after literally trying everything on the internet, nothing worked. So I resorted to a classic one and done solution that always helps fix problems like these; verifying my files.

So that's exactly what I did. I navigated and clicked on the verify game files button. That's when the absolute unthinkable thing happened.

It sat on 0% and immediately jumped to 100%. It said that 508 files needed to be replaced. I thought, "haha!" "I have rained superior over this game!" "Finally, after over two hours of extreme aggrivation, I can finally spend the rest of my sunday playing TES Online with my friends!"

However, as I navigated to the download screen, somethng horrifying crossed my eyes. 

Apparently, those 508 files.. 

WERE THE WHOLE FUCKING GAME!!!

So now, as I sit extremely depressed at the fact I won't be able to play the damn thing for at least another 3 days, I realize; what's the chance that this will actually work? How likely is it that I will start this up Wednesday afternoon, only to be greeted by the same issues that plauged me today? How likely is it that I will have to install the whole thing over again? Goddamn, this sucks some major ass.

TLDR: Game does not work, now I have been forced to spend 3 more days reinstalling it even though it will probably not work anyway.

(My apologies for the excess swearing and anger in this review, It just espicially angers me that I spent 10 dollars on this game and I can't get a refund because I have "Played" it for more than 2 hours. I'm going back to bed)

FAR is a very well put together game. The piloting of the land ship has some nice complexity to it that makes room for optomizing your movement but is still easy enough to get the hang of quickly. The puzzles are short but have that "ah ha" moments. The patches of peaceful sailing where you get to admire the view are  perfectly placed between the hectic managing of the engine and the parts where you have to stop to clear the way.

It is a very short game that I wish would keep on going, had it not ended as soon as it did I would probably not gotten any sleep tonight. This would be somewhere near the top of my list of favorite games, if I had such a list.

This game is truly a marvel. How such a small team managed to put together a game full of mechanics that flow flawlessly, music that leaves me in awe, and art design that gives me chills is something I'll never really understand. Hollow Knight is simultaneously adorable, grotesque, somber and lighthearted all at once, and for that I love it more than most any game out there. This will be a classic one day. So if you are someone who is drawn to video games for any reason, you must play this game. I can't give Team Cherry enough praise and I wish them the best on their future titles.
我喜欢这个游戏的每一位人物，他们给我的感觉，就像是一位位不同的活生生的：一位为了同伴们的安危而愿意舍身去爆破夜魔巢穴的毛头小子，在救援到来时，为了让他人安心完成自己未完成的爆破任务，隐瞒了自己的感染情况，最终离开人世，他的遗物，是一本记着对自己未完成的HS小说的挂念的遗书。许多这样的事情隐藏在了主线剧情，支线剧情以及收藏品当中，想要体会一番，就去探索吧！

한줄평 : 현재 존재하는 턴제 전략 게임중에서는 단연 최고, PC플랫폼 턴제 경영 보드게임의 배수진.

* 게임성
오리지날 버전에 비해 많은 DLC가 나와 문명의 종류도 다양해지고 컨텐츠의 양도 방대해졌습니다.

'게임은 흥미로운 선택의 연속이다.'라고 말했던 시드마이어의 말에 부합하게 굉장히 다양한 선택지가 존재해 지루할 틈을 주지 않습니다.

경제, 외교, 문화, 종교 등 다양한 성장지표가 존재해 선택한 문명에 맞게 유저들의 특성에 맞게 자유롭게 자신의 국가를 키울 수 있는 큰 장점이 있습니다. 생각보다 자유도가 엄청 높습니다.

최근에 유행하는 다른 게임들이 순발력이나 액션을 요구한다면 문명은 상대적으로 높은 두뇌플레이를 요구하며 확실히 차별성을 뒀습니다.(물론 쉬운난이도에서는 예외입니다.)

* 단점
문명 시리즈가 그렇듯 오리지널을 사기에는 너무 많은 컨텐츠를 숨겨놓은 상태입니다. DLC가 거의 모두 나오기 전에는 사지 않는
편이 유저입장에서는 좋습니다. (필자는 개발사를 믿고 Beyond earth를 오리지날 버전부터 샀다가 통수를 맞은 기억이 있습니다.)
현재 문명5는 더 이상 컨텐츠가 나오지 않을 것 같으므로 이 부분은 현재 단점으로 작용하지 않습니다.

다들 알다시피 플레이타임이 매우 긴 편입니다. Save&load를 이용하면 비교적 자유로운 플레이타임으로 즐길 수 있으나, 알려져 있다시피 한 턴만 더! 때문에 멈추기 힘들뿐더러 개인적으로 다시 플레이 할 바에는 새로 해야겠다는 생각이 많이 드는 편입니다.

많은 전략게임이 그렇듯 밸런스에 여러 문제점이 있습니다. 강한 문명(ex 쇼숀, 폴란드)와 약한 문명(ex 송가이)의 갭이 너무나도 크고, 시작지점에 따른 불평등함도 문제가 됩니다.

app_name: Getting Over It with Bennett Foddy
review:
If you've got patience and the will to not punch your monitor and then burn your house down, this game will be fun for you. It's extremely satisfying when you complete it and you genuinely feel like you're going on this short yet 'enlightnening' journey with the developer. It's a very simple yet unique game and you'll enjoy it if you have the willingness to adapt and learn from it. You'll be proud when you finish it.
Still have Vietnam flashbacks from it though.

I like it quite a lot. I think the main issue is that people lost their ability to read descriptions. Most complaints are about youngblood not being wolfenstein 3. There is a reason why it's called spin-off and why there is no 3 in the title. Solo is great fun, the option to play it in coop(very well designed for coop) is even better. The RPG elements are light and slightly better than in New Dawn and i really enjoyed New Dawn.More freedom, more exploration(collecting coins) and much more open levels make you rush less and enjoy more. If you want it linear, play CoD or Wolfenstein 1/2. If you want  a fun AAA shooter for half the price, go for it.  If you don't wanna play youngblood, you don't have to. No need to purchase it, get 10 mins of playtime just to give a bad review. Youngblood is a great game in terms of what it wants to be. It never got advertized as wolfenstein 3 so don't expect it to be a sequel.

Payday 2 is much like Payday 1 in that it touts stealth as being  an option but until you are leveled up, well equipped and know the maps well you don't really stand a chance of pulling the stealth off. It may leave a sour taste in your mouth that this so called heist game mainly revolves around shooting hundreds of police as they pour into the building full of bravado despite the already vast bodycount and your distaste would be justified if the gunplay wasn't so damn good. 

The game has a huge range of difficulty gained from having simple maps where cover is pletiful and the objectives are straightforward to carry out, like robbing a jewlery store, to heists which have multiple days and your performence on the ealier days can greatly affect how hard the final day is to pull off. These multi-day missions give a taste of the brutal difficulty of the first game with the "Overkill" difficulty being for the truley hardened and skilled players. The rewards for these longer multi day heists however are on a much grander scale than the quick 1 day jobs and have a much wider scale as well as that is a key system of the game: Greed. The loot you are required to steal to complete an objective is normally a fairly small amount maybe just 3 or 4 bags of weapons or jewlery or coacaine depending on the mission but the money reward for them is minor at best. When you secure loot bags past what is required the money you gain is huge in comparison and leaves your team eager to go back for more and its up to you to balance that risk reward and get out alive with the loot you can.

Completing a level gives you experiance which levels you up allowing you to purchase and use more weaponary which could suit your playstyle better and gives you money to spend on these weapons. At the end of a heist you also get a loot card which could be money, exp, a weapon mod unlock, a mask unlock, a mask material unlock or a mask pattern unlock. This random drop at the end of heists can be exhilerating when it yeilds a mask you had no idea existed and is perfect for you or the weapon mod to finally complete a gun you love or it can be saddening as you get weapon mods for guns you don't use over and over. Overall I feel that this adds good replayability to the game as the frustration is largely subsided by the new casino system where you can spend offshore account money(Money which is taken at the end of every heist to be laundered and it's only other use is to buy missions) to get more drops but you can alter the percentages of each option by spending more moeny.

The Skill tree system with level ups giving points to spend on your chosen class (or any other) is a huge visual improvement to the hard to comprehend skill system of the first game and by having multiple skills you can specilize in at each teir it allows you choice and helps you to improve your character based on the way you play and fit into the team you play with. The weapons all have advantages and disadvantages leaving no weapons feeling underpowered and your loadout will normally be based on the guns you enjoy using (Or you think look prettyist)

I feel they took the successes of the first game and built upon them to even greater heights while also buffing out the major flaws in the system. This game is a great Co-Op shooter ,possibly the best currently around, with fantastic gunplay and stealth options but if you are looking for a cool heist game this probably won't cut it for you.
FANTASTIC GAME!!!

They Are Billions kurz abgehandelt.
Bei diesem Strategie/Survival Game würde es für mich Hassliebe am ehesten beschreiben.
Man zockt hier einfach mal 5-10 Stunden und Booom. Eine Horde etwas falsch eingeschätzt und vorbei ist der Spass.
Zur Erklärung, ein Zombie schaltet ein Gebäude der Basis aus und alle darin benötigten Arbeiter mutieren ebenfalls.
Genauso ist es im Late Game. Hat man die Map nicht ausreichend gesäubert so kann es vorkommen, dass die letzten Horden unschaffbar sind. Denen schließen sich nämlich alle auf der Map verbleibenden Gegner an.
Wer allerdings auf Herausforderung und den Nackten Kampf ums Überleben steht (bzw einfach ein old school zocker ist), sollte auf jeden Fall bei diesem Game nicht zögern.

Pros:
-Challanging
-gutes Konzept
-Stundenfresser ;) (ob Pro/Con)
-gelungene in Game Stimmung
-ansprechende Grafik (für ein solches Game/es ist nun mal kein Benchmark Titel)

Cons:
-Einheiten reagieren ab und an träge
-noch kein Co op
-die Obergrenze für Mauern könnte besser gelöst werden

Alles in Allem, ein Top Game und für einen Early Access sehr gut spielbar. Überzeugt euch am besten selbst und entwickelt eure eigene Hassliebe zu They Are Billions. Mit etwas Motivation kommt der Co Op Modus sicher auch demnächst ;)

This game is amazing, I have played way before the official launch, but with all the amazing new content, its crazy how much content and freedom there is. If you are creative, you can really make 'almost' anything a reality in this game. The building system is extremely detailed, and has a lot of good tools, you will not find in any other game. Rainbow Six Siege is perhaps one of the better competitive shooters that have recently come out in a while. You’re guaranteed to have moments where it’s extremely frustrating or exhilarating; there are plenty of “Operators” (Basically Characters) to choose from though unfortunately you must unlock them before you can even try them out. If PVP isn’t your fancy and you prefer killing enemy AI with your friends, try out Terrorist Mode which sets you and your team in different scenarios where you must attack or defend yourselves from terrorists. The game has multiple scenarios that you can play, hostage and defuse bomb are some examples. All in all the game is definitely worth paying money for and I highly suggest this game if you want to play with friends.

I have owned this game for quite a while now, not owning any DLC currently. I have recently started to get back into the game, but I have been met with horrendous performance issues - frequent lag spikes every 5 seconds (with no exaduration), considerable delay when switching weapons and horrendous and I mean god awful load times. 

My settings rest at medium/high, which my PC should be more than cable with, my specs being

GTX 960
i7 6700K
16 GB ram

I don't know what has happened since I last played, but either through updates or nvidea drivers, this game has turned into a lag fest that really disheartens me from playing, which is a shame, because I have anted to get back into this for a while, and have contemplated buying the season pass (from G2A, as £39.99 is pretty steep on steam, as that is equivilent to the game) however I have not due to these issues.

Come on Bethesda! I don't wanna see this in my game. I've adored the Fallout/Elder Scrolls series and have never encountered this before so I will give them the benefit of the doubt - but this needs to be sorted the hell out.

Early Access Beta 7.0.5

Ich bin sehr begeistert von diesem Spiel. Macht sehr viel Spaß. Ich weiß nicht, ob man es alleine spielen kann. Aber in einer guten Gruppe/Dorf auf einen Server macht es richtig Laune. Arbeitsteilung und Absprachen sind Pflicht. Man kann nich alles auf einmal lernen, die Skillpunkte sind begrenzt, da man diese nur über Zeit bekommt. Man muß auf sehr viel achte. Z.B. beim schmelzen von Erzen, die Abfallprodukte müssen "sachgerecht entsorgt werden". Nicht einfach ins Meer kippen oder irgentwo liegen lasse, da ist einen Umweltverschmutzung vorprogrammiert, diese sich dann negativ Auswirkt. 

Positiv finde ich auch die Devs. Man kann über Discord Kontakt aufnehmen und man bekommt geholfen, die Devs freuen sich über Rückmeldungen. Auch kommen bis jetzt regelmässig Patches. 

Ich kann diesen Spiel sehr empfehlen, für Leute die in Guppen spielen möchten und sich in einem Spiel auch mal Gedanken machen zu müssen.

"This. Is. Awesome. Nothing else to say." - Review on the 8th May 2013

Coming back to this revew almost 2 years later as I have recently started playing again. I had no desire of going back to the single player story mode again as, like many players, the boredom of trying to get 100% without looking at guides and webpages, proved to much for me to handle. Instead I went to the multiplayer. Now I don't understand how the mulitplayer gets bad reviews. I like it, I think its great. It's simple yet diverse at the same time with hidden tricks and qualities that are revealed as you level up. Yes the system and servers are terrible, with the game glitching, freezing and kicking people out of matches, but that's Steams fault, not TR's. Anyway sometimes the glitches are funny - who doesn't laugh at Lara's manic, high-speed movements as she gets stuck between a rock :'D. I love the single player, but it gets old and in multiplayer mode there is always something different...apart from the cheaters and hackers. There are SO many. Too many. This is what brings the multiplayer down for me. I don't understand why some players think it's acceptable to cheat. It ruins the fun for everyone. The problem is that they keep getting away with it. No one checks the servers anymore - they didn't really to begin with - so they don't get banned and they keep cheating. It's still not going to stop me playing though. And nor will it affect the good TR players from playing; crizzl, nekov4ego, King-T to name a few. Nothing is better than laughing at a cheaters rage as you continually beat them - Mothra, PETIT LION, juliennatacha - all of them beat, over and over again. It makes my day!

Overall I give Tomb Raider 4.5 stars as nothing deserves 5 stars - maybe Rise of the Tomb Raider when it comes out on PC. Seriously Crystal Dynamics / Square Enix, why make it exculusive to X-box One when the majority of the players are PC users? It doesn't make sense. I hope that they include a multiplayer feature on that game - one that hasn't been put together at the last minute! :D

包含山区、丘陵、平原等地形，高达近200平方公里的地图。 既有森林，又有荒漠，还有盐平原。这次育碧再次用其强大的技术在游戏中重现了南美洲玻利维亚的地形、地貌和气候。而剧情上美国4傻小分队从一个个毒贩开始追查，直至整个贩毒集团的最终头目的编排，虽然在游戏中夹杂在庞大的主线和支线任务中，略微显得松散，但是整体给人一种看电影般的效果。开放世界，庞大的枪支和技能系统，实至名归的3A级大作。

游戏远没有打完，
实在是异常兴奋想要表达了。
已经很久没有见过一款玩法，剧情，美术，音乐，交互系统都接近完满的游戏了。
游戏的童趣，纯粹和饱满令人沉浸其中而倍感温暖。

游戏开头稍许慢热，
第一章玩起来还有点Mario3Dland的感觉，
到了第二章完全是超展开了，
多变而合理的剧情和玩法升级，
令探索性游玩体验满足感爆棚。
部分章节和关卡设计令人想起了跳楼少女和PS3上的剪刀王子。
游戏系统里的勋章和不同帽子的搭配组合，有一点Costume Quest的感觉。

P.S.买这个游戏之前，
从未料想过这游戏里居然有黑童话，
算是意外之喜吧。
时空裂缝对剧情的补充实在是太好了。
各种名画和文学名著的引用令书呆子感到幸福( •̀ ω •́ )y
