app_name: Total War: ROME II - Emperor Edition
review: Es un vicio. a mí parecer uno de los mejores de la franquicia (empatado con Warhammer II y Medieval II). La mezcla de estrategia y tácticas militares permiten que cada jugador pueda disfrutar lo que más le apetezca. A mí los combates entre ejércitos se me dan muy mal y no me interesan, así que puedo saltármelos y centrarme en la gestión y la expansión. Recomiendo pillarse todos los DLCs cuando estén de ofertas, porque las campañas y facciones que añaden son geniales.

Super jeu, très beau, le design est super sympa.
Un style Souls like, plus permissif sur les erreurs, mais tout de même difficile surtout quelque combats.
Un peu énervant sur certain combats de se prendre 2 attaques qui couvrent 90% de la pièce en ayant uen demie seconde pour réagir, mais comme dit pas d'os et une possibilité de régen plutot efficace.
Possibilité de trouvé des upgrades de diverse formes.
Je sais pas si il y a un autre moyen mais le jeu nous indique devant le combat final et après sur la save le % de complétion si ca peu intéresser certain.

Definitely recommend to anyone who understands at least SOMETHING in global strategies
- better than VI (and cheaper, even freaking dlc's are cheaper and make more sense than there)
- both with DLC and mods you can sit up for dozens of hours ahead

Ба! Ты вернулась! Я и не рассчитывал... Я не могу заново установить ту ловушку... Так. А ты можешь сама прыгнуть эту яму? Пожалуйста, прыгни сама в эту яму.
Ты можешь сама прыгнуть эту яму? Туда. В смертельную яму?
Наверное, ты думаешь, зачем тебе прыгать в эту яму? А я скажу тебе! Угадай, кто там? Твои родители! Ты не подкидыш! Там в яме твои настоящие родители! Я должен был сказать тебе раньше, но не сказал. Так что прыгай и обними мамочку и папочку. О, я тебе скажу, что там еще есть. Твои родители и... спасательный лифт! Да, там! Забавно. Надо было сказать раньше. Ну, так или иначе, они все там. Так что сигай. Прыгай. Тебя там ждут твои предки и спасательный лифт.
Та-а-ак, что там у нас еще?.. Да! Там новенький комбинезон. Очень модный дизайнерский комбинезон из Франции. Прямо там. Как раз твой размерчик. А если будет слегка мешковат, то там и портной есть, подгонит по фигуре. А это что? Ба-а, какая прелестная сумочка! И трехпортальное устройство! И все это там! И... Твоя яхта! И... Мальчики! Куча парней. Красавцы. Может, один даже станет твоим парнем! Сейчас еще рано говорить. Но-о... много симпатичных парней. И, ох, и музыкальная группа, бойз-бэнд тоже там! Они уже лет сто женщину не видели. И они совсем не привередливы. Им ничего, что у тебя повреждение мозга, и что ты носилась тут, вся вспотела. И... Ферма! Ферма с пони! А еще... А... Ну, прыгни, пожалуйста.

     Final verdict- Yes!

夏促的时候在puge，R6和杀鸡之间犹豫了很久，结果还是买了杀鸡。我惊讶的发现游戏并没有我想的那么不友好，相反队友很友好，匹配很快。目前没有出现断联的情况。我本来想玩一局就睡的，结果买来一口气玩了1.5小时。

Joguei o primeiro Harvest Mon na época de cartuchos do SNES. Lembro que havia uma tradução para o português que nunca saiu e isso me forçou a aprender inglês. Bem, pelo menos foi um dos muitos jogos. Desde então guardo com muito carinho as horas de diversão que tive em minha infância com o jogo.

Comprei este por ser idêntico ao primeiro da versão SNES, pelas altas pontuações que esteve recebendo e não me arrependo. Vale totalmente cada centavo pago. O jogo consegue ser melhor que qualquer Harvet Moon que já joguei. É como o primeiro mas com jogabilidade infinitamente melhorada e com horas e horas de conteúdo para se explorar.

O game continua com constantes atualizações mesmo após ter sido lançado a algum tempo, e sem aquela desgraça de DLC, totalmente de graça mesmo.

Recomendo totalmente para os fãs da séria da Natsume. Garanto que será uma ótima experiência e um tempo bem gasto.

app_name: Ni no Kuni™ II: Revenant Kingdom
review:
剧情平平无奇，进度又奇慢，一开始只有大地图上的战斗，差点就放弃了。
过了好几章才有支线，有国家建设和大地图上的战役模式。
建设和战役其实还行，但早期建设产出的金币和材料是有上限的，你不回国领取的话，就没法增加，就很烦。
也就变成了，做支线，回国，打战役，回国，刷几次怪，回国的常回家看看的模式了。
然后是传送的问题。很奇怪的是，明明有地形较为详细的大的世界地图不用，我还非得在很难识别地形的小世界地图上选择，
一开始不太熟悉的话，需要来回确认，很麻烦。选择模式也是奇葩，一个一个切换着点，
而不是直接平移方框选择，用手柄经常会很难切到要选的位置。
前期战斗里很缺魔，与其等回蓝球，不如平A。精灵有会回血技能的，为什么没有会回蓝技能的呀。
然后是怪，怪太弱了，不选困难以上模式，早就弃了。怪的种类也太少，来来回回那几种样子的。
除了支线，还有一类任务是到指定的人物处领的，一般就是交一定数量的某种材料或打倒一定数量的某种怪，
因为没有一般怪物的图签，基本上只能根据材料或怪物所在地点来找，一开始不熟悉系统去查看地点，光看名字不知道是啥。
大地图的宝箱基本没什么价值的，完全比不上战斗中掉的装备或自产的材料，意味不明。

如果你看到这里还想尝试一下的话，给你几个建议：
国家建造时，优先升级给建造和升级减费用的建筑，也就是中央广场内上面两栋，你会省很多钱。
记得给国家内的人物升级，有的技术要达到大师级别的人物才能开发。
注意小地图上的蓝色感叹号，一些不常进的图或旧城镇会刷出支线，国家地图内新加了人后也会刷出些支线任务。

以下是对于剧情的评价：
完全没有感受到因小国王的成长而带来的感动，在经过了漫长的洗白之路，大部分BOSS变为和蔼可亲的战友，太过于平淡的剧情，只让我记得各种让国王跑腿的支线（你们的王真的很闲啊）。通关时真是一种解脱，所以我到底是为什么而通的关啊。

Playing at 10 pm when i should be sleeping for tomorrow class :

"Just one more turn, and i'll go to sleep after i quicksave this"

Aaaaand it's morning already

10/10 - One does not simply play civilization for "Just one more turn"

review: it is a shockingly good turned based rpg

+ najlepsza gra swojego gatunku

+ ciągłe aktualizacje

MOJA OCENA: 8/10

Great art, music, combat, and story. The game is also very challenging, which is a plus for me. I've seen it compared to Dark Souls several times.
In my nearly 100% playthrough, I have witnessed a few bugs, long loading times, and minor gamepad lag issues.
Backtracking is a chore that you will have to overcome and large movement options [spoiler]like stag stations and trams[/spoiler] are surprisingly few and far between. 
Finished my normal (non 100%) run in about 20 hours so this game is well worth its price.

As someone who has never been able to get into souls game before, I have to say I'm really glad I took a chance on this one. The things that turned me off with past souls games are here...but for some reason are more tolerable. I feel like Sekiro is more structured and there are lots of aha! moments when you unlock a new item or skill to try against a boss. Also, while guides and walkthroughs do help, I was surprised with how often I would wind up utilizing my own strategy and winning in interesting ways. Sekiro has got me hooked and I'm probably give the other Souls games a try. 

I will probably never kill Lady Butterfly though...

2 heures et deja assez déçu, j'ai l'impression de jouer a Call Of. 
1. le temps de visée est ridicule : Avec une arme de plusieurs kilos vous pouvez viser et etre précis en 0,0001 seconde. 
2. La vie des mecs en armure est abusée, mettez y le chargeur ils seront encore debout
3. Le feeling, l'animation tout fait BEAUCOUP trop Jeu Arcade, typiquement l'inverse du 1.
4. Maps pas dingue, joueurs adverse à l'adversité inexistante ( vous les contourner ils se laisseront tuer ) 
5. Sound design acceptable mais pas génial. 

Résumé : Manque énorme de difficulté, on s'emmerde vite tellement le challenge manque, tout est acquis dès le départ tellement c'est casu. Enfin.. tout non puisque vous devrez débloquer les classes par niveaux, idée nulle qui permettra à un niveau 1 de se faire laminer par un sniper sans pouvoir se venger par les mêmes armes que son assassin.

Bref si vous voulez un bon jeu militaire avec une bonne commu; du challenge et de la stratégie Jouez à Squad. 
Là on est clairement sur un Call of Duty Modern Warfare en moins cher mais de qualité équitable.
Me gusta muchísimo la jugabilidad, los personajes, el diseño y las actualizaciones y la atención que le brindan al juego. Muy recomendado.

Bring on the threequel :D

在这个游戏里，“死”不是一种结果，而是一个的过程，且稍为焦躁漫长的过程。所以一开始玩这个游戏的时候，会认为这个过程过于浪费时间。然而掌握套路之后，打铁+红点忍杀的音效将会给你彻底洗脑，导致我时刻处于一种脑子里回放着“看破后忍杀”的音效，上瘾且无法自拔......

团队设计地图的时候很显然下了不少功夫，大部分的地方玩家可以研究潜行的路线来给游戏降低到一个合理的难度。然而在油管看了不少Boss战之后会觉得你们玩的根本不是一个游戏。[spoiler]幻影破戒僧可以中毒药雾鸦大法潜行带走你敢信？真人破戒僧可以跳树潜行强行带走两格血你敢信？嗟怨之鬼可以直接卡屋顶悬崖掉下去秒杀你敢信？而且到现在都没有修复，这也许是宫崎老贼最后的善意了吧！[/spoiler]

许多关于游戏的剧情背景隐藏极深，需要仔细寻找线索，结合各种主线书信的文字，才能对故事有个更深的了解。[spoiler]（推荐Dogsama的只狼剧情分析视频，目前我看来最准确的分析就是他做的了）[/spoiler]

[h1]剧情逻辑像是在骗小孩儿[/h1]
游戏的游戏性还是可以的，普通难度可以给玩家不错的游戏体验。
收集元素本身难度适中，“古墓”的设计比较经典，解谜做的还是不错的。
然而具有很多游戏的通病就是，武器种类虽然多，但是每种武器的必要性太差，换言之就是，如果游戏只有一把弓就可以通关了。
另外一点就是这个剧情……
[strike]作为一个游戏有明显的zz倾向，这一点对玩家非常的不友善。总是把自己的一厢情愿强加给每个人。[/strike]
另外一点就是过于缺乏逻辑性。这里不剧透，只是说明剧情从头到尾就像是一群中二病过家家，无论是争吵，还是理由，都过于牵强。
剧情非常的不给人代入感。让人有一种“哦，这样啊。”的感觉，完全无法产生共鸣。
有一种，“我想营造一个超有内涵的大片”，[strike]然而全程在强行正义、强行激昂慷慨、强行主角正确、强行伟人伟大……[/strike]理由有些太过不充分。
然而，最致命的是，一个以“探险”为噱头的游戏如果从游戏一开始就让人知道谜底是什么。这个剧情设定就太过浅薄……为了不剧透就不具体说明了……
所以，就是想杀人收集物品的玩家可以尝试，但是追求有合理逻辑剧情的玩家就不必尝试了。
一级棒。适合自己一个人的时候慢慢玩，

Overall I would give this game a 4/5 but if the helpers were fixed then it would easily be a 5/5.

As someone who has never played a monster hunter game and played dauntless for a bit; this game is far superior to dauntless. You ever felt like dauntless was missing something? Monster Hunter World has a ton of depth to the game and fighting monsters can be challenging without being overwhelming. The selection of weapons to choose from had me for like thirty minutes to a hour trying to figure out what I wanted. The game does a great job at making you feel like a hunter and gives you a lot of freedom when put into the open world. The game can be a bit overwhelming at first because there are a lot of mechanics you need to get familiar with and how dodge rolling works, but stick with it, it's fun and it all worth it. Every monster is different and all do different things and you may die a few times, but when you finally beat it, it is super satisfying. I highly recommend this game to people who like dauntless, but want something more. You can play the game solo which is what most of the story will be. It is easier if you have help, but never feel like you need others to play. As I previously mentioned it is super satisfying when you slay a monster like Nergigante for the first time and you were by yourself.

app_name: Total War: ROME II - Emperor Edition
review:
Gra pomimo tego, że minęło trochę czasu od wydania nadal jest GENIALNA.
Rozegrałem w tej grze mnóstwo kampani, stoczyłem wiele bitew, spędziłem w tej grze dziesiątki, a nawet setki godzin( nie patrzcie na liczbę godzin która jest pokazana bo grałem głównie na offline gdzie nie wliczają się godziny). Gra od samego początku bardzo wciąga gracza, zachęca do dalszej rozgrywki. Wydaje mi sie, że jest to najlepsza gra strategiczna osadzona w starożytności. Cudowna, nie starzejąca się grafika, OGROMNY świat.do dyspozycji gracza, wiele możliwości prowadzenia kampanii.
Gra dopuszcza sterowanie OGROMNYMI, KOLOSALNYMI wręcz armiami, które walczące na polu bitwy wyglądają EPICKO. Piękne modele jednostek, super wykonane animacje walki. Możliwość prowadzenia epickich bitew w polu, oblegania potężnych miast jak i mniejszych osad, obrona miast, to wszystko wygląda fenomenalnie. W kampanii możemy zmierzyć się z wieloma problemami do rozwikłania, musimy dbać o ekonomię, wojsko co jest oczywiste, ale i o niepokoje społeczne, czy nastawienie bogów starożytnego świata do nas. Sojusze, wojny, zdrady, spiski, knowania, potężne armie i ogromne lokacje sprawiają, że ciężko jest oderwać się od gry. Polecam każdemu fanowi gier strategicznych czy fanowi serii Total War do ogrania tego tytułu, ta gra to tak naprawdę niekończąca się przyjemność. Mnóstwo frakcji oznacza mnóstwo możliwości na prowadzenie kampanii. 
KUPUJCIE TĘ GRĘ!!!!!

This game will only get better as time goes on, because it was not finished at release. 

I would say (in retrospect) buy this when the SECOND one in the series comes out, or when it is @ 30 percent off. By then it will actually be at a polished level. It was not R2 bad on release, but there is still a startling amount of bugs. When they are reported they are tossed into the bug forum (AKA the graveyard) to be ignored.

Each title CA releases feels like they give less of a shit, and is more about cranking out DLC before the base game is even complete.

BASE GAME Rev @ Launch 6.5/10
Blood and Gore 9/10
Grim/Grave 4/10
Warlord and King 10/10
Beastmen 3/10, this was a complete let down, the "narrative" campaign was not worth even playing.

Oh, and the MP as of November 16 is still very imbalanced, there are essentially two tiers, competitive races and the non competitive. With the DLC being pay to win as well.

La ambientación es buena y está muy lograda, al principio parece un autentico juego de terror y tiene momentos muy buenos, lástima que luego se vaya perdiendo esa esencia. Me esperaba un juego más tipo Outlas pero sigue siendo un Resident Evil  y el día que un personaje de la saga aprenda a correr de lado, marcha atrás, girando o disparando será un gran paso para la humanidad. Y ya no digamos el poder llevar algo más que unas llaves en el bolsillo.

The game is laid out a lot like the original half life but has MUCH more polish, also runs great on my garbage laptop at max settings so its better optimized than most games of the era. If you've played half life the map layouts will feel very familiar. 

I do have some things to gripe about, a lot of minor stuff that would add polish if addressed.
-Some of the weapons are a bit iffy to use against enemies that seem to have better handling of the gun (could just be frame lag on my end).
-The zoom for the crossbow is so far it feels kind of useless.
-the shotgun feels a bit TOO accurate but at the same time its effective range is paradoxically short.
-HECU soldiers seem a little too aware of the situation, any crouch walking triggers them in a large radius.


Aside from that I love it, perfect blend of classic gameplay with contempary graphics and music.

Doom Eternal is a masterpiece, they improved on everything that Doom (2016) had done from both a gameplay and story perspective and made one of the best FPS's of all time in the process. The only negatives i can think of are the purple goo that slows you down and prevents jumping, its annoying and does slow down the pacing a little too much, I also feel like the Marauder might need a bit of work, he likewise also slows down the pacing but in a different way since now you constantly have to pay attention to him specifically. These don't really detract from the game being amazing they're just little things that are a little more annoying than fun. The only other thing i can think of is purely a personal one, and its that I do prefer some of the more horrific demon designs from Doom (2016), like the Possessed Soldier and the Mancubus, as well as the lighting style in that game, but Eternal still has amazing designs for other demons such as the Prowler and artistically stunning areas like Urdak and Exultia. And of course the soundtrack by the magnificent Mick Gordon is just brutal perfection, from the action packed tracks like "The only thing they fear is you" to the low brooding heavy metal chorus you hear in the Cultist Base to the desolate yet still sinister emptyness of Exultia and the Sentinel areas and the ethereal alien chorus in Urdak, Mick has once again outdone himself. I should probably stop since at this point i'm just gushing about the game but its a masterpiece, Game of the Year contender easily.

版本的不同：
       55元版本不送如何角色，而且普通角色一个的价格为12500声望（类似金币），然后DLC角色一个25000。

       168元版本同样不送任何角色，但每个队伍的角色(如：SAS、GIGN的部队)的价格依次为500-1000-1500-2000，DLC角色同样为25000一个。

       288元版本不送普通角色（价格同168），但是送8个今年的DLC角色（目前没有出完2017年9月1日21:50:21），去年的8个DLC也是25000一个。

       348元版本也不送普通角色（价格同168),送2016年和2017年的全部DLC角色。

Rust, the game I bought back in 2013, was okay, and had the potential to be a really neat experience where you go off into the wilderness, and survive off the land. This game could have been just as fun solo as with a server full of friends. This game did not happen.

Instead, we got a game where 'survival' is primarily either a bit of hiding and a lot of respawning, or getting in the good graces of a horde of people that see you as nothing more than a means to an end. Perhaps if the community had been cultivated to not be the most toxic I've come across, there would still be hope, but sadly that is not the case.

There are PvE servers out there, but they lose their charm as you gradually learn how little depth the game truly has. There are clans, which might interest you, sure, but I've never been the sort of gamer to play games on a schedule.

Overall, not the game for me. Not anymore.

The main thing first: is this game worth trying? If you loved the previous one, then yes, most definitely. If you havent't play the previous game, but still curious about this one: you should better start from the previous game, but if you don't have it -- okay, this game might interest you as well. If you didn't like the previous game, you could still try this one, maybe it will hook you up this time. Why? Because the game has been improved, perfected. It just evolved, as everything should.

In short: this is one of the best games I've ever played, and if you have good enough PC you should definitely try it.

Graphics.
This is this the first thing you'll notice. They made the game look gorgeous. Because of the modern graphics technologies, it's quite ugly to look at with minimal settings (all new games I know of are like that), but medium settings and/or low resolution will be a good solution of that problem. So, if you have good GPU and enough RAM, the game will give you unforgettable visual experience. I took tens of screenshots of the scenery during my playthrough. Stopping somewhere and just gazing around has also became a custom. Very happy about the graphics.

Cutscenes.
In the previous game they were just there. No biggie. But in this one they really mastered how one should approach this field. The use of light and shadows, facial expressions, camera movements and angles -- all of this is very cinematic, beautiful, right. You just want to see more. And the fact that it's not pre-rendered adds complexity as you can see blood and dirt on Lara, as there's no load time. They make the game much richer and more beautiful. I would like the rest of game developers to learn how to make good-looking cutscenes. But not only them. Film and cartoon studios should take notice too as sometimes they are so ugly and stupid.

Music.
In the previous game music was good, but now it got perfected. Battle music is loud, fast and hard, resembling for me music from Mad Max Furry Road. Exploration music in tombs is beautiful and drives you forward. But not too fast, other way the music will end too early. I found it hard to find a place in the middle of a fight where I will be safe and could just sit and enjoy that soundtrack. But it is worth it.

Voice acting.
In the very beginning of the game something weird happened and the characters sounded very weird. Don't worry, it'll pass in a few minutes. It the rest of the game the voice acting is beautiful. Half of big films and cartoons have much worse voice acting. Everyone is just alive, they are really there in that situations, they really feel, and think, and act. Very good voice acting.

The plot. The last game was just about survival, this one is about solving a mystery and helping people along the way. We get to know Lara and Croft family a bit more not just from memories, but in person. (Blood Ties DLC done a great job with explaining the background. I strongly recommend to check it out AFTER you finish the game) There are still a lot of recordings, all of which are beautifully voice acted. They are explaining people you're trying to help, your enemies, your friends. Video recordings were replaced by Lara's childhood memories. But they are just a nice addition, the majority of the plot is explained through cutscenes about present time and recordings. The whole game is much more about Lara and her family, than the previous one. No spoilers. Everything is done extremely well.

Gameplay.
No major changes since the last game. Some new ways to get around, some new abilities and mechanics, like learning new languages, but in general they just polished the gameplay on the last game, that was already very good. Tombs now can be bigger (even much bigger) and more complex. In the end of each of them you will find a special new ability you cannot get any other way. Also, there are crypts, where there's no puzzle, but the way itself into one of those crypts might be more complicated. The main reason for crypts is the lore, and a weapon part. GPS caches were replaced with coins you can exchange for new tools, weapons or clothes, so no more loot just for XP or achievements. All the resource gathering, challenges and exploring are still there. Side missions became a nice addition to the game. They are optional, but I had no problem completing them. Reward is a reward.

Conclusion.
Why? Why did they change Lara's face? Not too much, but unmistakable. What were they thinking? Not like Lara is now ugly. Less beautiful -- yes, different looking which annoyingly keeps occurring to you -- yes. Other than that, the game was definitely worth the money. It was worth long wait and savings to buy a new GPU. Wonderful game.

The only complaint I have (except Lara's new face) was a bug with DX12 (it does improve performance on my machine, don't know about the others). If your game crashes of the "final" cutscene too, just try DX11.

Very creative and challenging game. The mods are such a good feature. I have spent 5 hours playing this game straight, 11/10 would recommend.

TL; DR - It's fun and challenging at times depending on the settings you use. Buggy and crashes on occasion. Has potential to be a really good game with lots of community support.

Dislikes:

The game is still pretty buggy (like a lot). Often times I find myself saving and reloading because a character got stuck in a door or against a wall. The character movement engine takes a roundabout way to get to the destination a lot of times. I sometimes have to reload the game when an area becomes "anti-movement". 

The help menu could use a lot of improvements to a new player, its more or less a pain in the ass until you get to a point you can understand the UI. A couple tips for the game would be to hold the right mouse button on something if you can't figure out how to use it and the left alt button (not sure why the right one doesn't work) to look at items on the ground.

The enemy will almost always be stronger than the player, but that’s okay, run like hell to the nearest town and hope the guards can help you or hold them off while you run further. The only issue I have is when the movement engine runs you into a dead end trying to get there and then you get trapped between a hard place and a pointy metal rod. 

The research system requires books or engineering that can only be bought or found. You can buy researched things but only if you know the pre-reqs. Makes the game a bit hard in the beginning until you get some cash flow.

Likes:

The game has a lot of Space where you can build and explore. I spent 40~ hours in five towns, I have yet to count how many towns there are that I know about, but there are a lot.

The community is pretty active in mods. I looked through the most popular mods and found a few to change some of the game dynamics I didn't like.

The game is just hard... I know a lot of people like to be stronger than the enemies, but to be honest that makes a boring game. This game makes you use strategies to overcome the bandits and holy nut jobs that hate you. The AI stills needs a lot of work, but that just gives me an old StarCraft feel.

All in all, if you have read this far, it may piss you of sometimes, but it’s a game spend time thinking about at work when I’m supposed to be doing “more important things”. I think that’s worth the money you spend on it.

首先，从游戏性来讲，这个游戏很好玩，硬怼，阴人，怂都可以，不管按照哪种思路玩都很有意思，可以满足各种玩家的需求。
但是，这个游戏的优化和服务器都是数一数二的烂，我的电脑12G内存，970显卡，虽然不算好但是一般的游戏都能流畅的运行，大型游戏至少也可以中配无压力，但在这款游戏上，所有设置开最低依旧帧数不稳定，打几盘就得重开释放内存；再说服务器，我加速器供着，100M的光纤，依旧卡的出奇，不知道什么时候走着走了就卡，开门卡，关门卡，开车卡，坐船卡，而且说实在的，在我所有对枪（怎么说我也是个老FPS玩家对枪也不弱）死亡里，至少有一半是卡的瞄着人打着打着人就瞬移了，两个人一起对射就卡成PPT，真不知道这无数个98都用来干嘛了。
总结：游戏是好玩的，服务器是垃圾的，目前来看这个游戏并不值98加月供加速器。官方如果肯拿着钱好好做优化，那这个游戏前景无量。否则，这游戏吃枣药丸

Portal 2 is easily one of the greatest sequels in video game history. Its linear puzzles never feel dull, and induce the perfect balance between frustration and reward. Naturally we've come to expect this "higher-level" and more intellectual type of game from Valve (considering the first Portal, Half-Life, and Counter-Strike), however Portal 2 takes the cake with its strong level design and robust application of early concepts. Never before has a game managed to make me feel like a genius within seconds being under the impression that I may be the dumbest person to ever rest my hands on a mouse and keyboard. [b]Portal 2 makes you think different.[/b] This is the most important feature the game has to offer. If it wasn't for the way Portal forced my brain to think, then I doubt I'd be half as invested in programming as I am today. The cherry on top is the characterization and convoluted plot, which elevate this work from one of the greatest puzzle games ever made to one of the greatest games ever played. [b]If you haven't already, buy this game right now.[/b]

日)たまに息抜きにする程度でいいと思います。
理由は以下の通り
度重なるアプデと一緒にグリッヂとパケロス増加、設定言語によって試合中に表示されるものが他の言語に比べて早く消える、
他のゲームと比べて高いスペックを要求するのに高いスペックを用意してもクラッシュする等。
チーター対策としてすべてのデータをクラウド化してほしい。

中)我觉得偶尔休息一下就够了。
原因如下
增加Glitch和丢包的情况随着重复应用的增加，有些设置语言在比赛过程中出现的时候会比其他语言消失的更快，并且
与其他游戏相比，它需要高规格，但即便是高规格也会崩溃等等。
我希望所有的数据都在云端，作为对付骗子的对策。

ENG)I think it's enough to take a break once in a while.
The reasons are as follows
Increased Glitch and packet loss along with repeated apps, some setting languages show up during a match and disappear faster than others, and
It requires high specs compared to other games, but crashes even when you get high specs, etc.
I want all data to be in the cloud as a countermeasure against cheaters.

我只想问一句封了几十W的号钱去了哪里？只封号不改进游戏体验吗。

萌新必须知道的一些基本操作：1.鼠标左键修理发电机、濒死恢复、尝试脱钩、救下钩上队友、治疗队友、破坏图腾、翻箱子。2.鼠标右键使用道具（医疗包，工具箱，钥匙，手电筒，地图）。3.ctrl键蹲下。4.空格键QTE、钩子挣扎、慢速进柜、慢速出柜、放板子、慢速过板、慢速翻窗、辅助动作（使用娃哈哈、针）5.shift开始奔跑，shift+空格快速进柜、快速出柜、快速翻窗、快速过板。6.E键能力激活（部分特殊技能如钢筋铁骨，声东击西才有）7.数字1键向前指，表示去那里。数字2键跟我来（你过来啊!）
前十个小时可能这还是个恐怖游戏，再多玩玩可能就不是啦。（但是个人感觉消声怨灵和敲钟还是有点吓人）
游戏里那些以“皇”命名的梗：
1.人皇：指喜欢主动寻找屠夫的强大存在，经常以一己之力溜屠夫数台发电机，皮断腿。（修机是不可能的）
2.机皇：执着于修理发电机，次次完美检验，150小能手，没有什么能阻挡我修机!（厄咒毁灭?不存在的）
3.怂皇：听到心跳就赶紧找个地方蹲起来，多用黑妹，自己都看不见自己。（屠夫：尼玛人都藏哪儿去了）
4.树皇：被屠夫追活不过十秒，常年在钩子上看风景，秒躺就是我了!（树下一分钟树上十年功）
5.柜皇：两个极端，第一种是常年躲在柜子里玩藏猫猫的另类怂皇，第二种是利用柜子把屠夫溜懵逼的人皇。
6.屠皇：经验老道的屠夫，砍的人类哭爹喊娘，但是有时非常热心的请人类吃苹果。
那么，问题来了，你想成为哪一种玩家呢?

Ganske udemærket tidsfordriv's spil. Afhængig af mapstørrelse naturligvis... Huge map med alle modstanderne, kan i visse tilfælde være svært at komme igennem inden tidsgrænsen (hvis den er valgt. Den er som standard 500 ture).

Et væld af enheder, improvements og alskens detaljer i religion/social policies. Det tager temmelig noget tid at sætte sig ind i alle detaljerne, men efterhånden er det ganske sjovt.
Det ser lidt specielt ud, når ens by når 66 i størrelse (selvom det kun er sket 2 gange i min spilletid på næsten 3k).

AI'en kan godt være lidt brutal indimellem fra King og opefter, især hvis man glemmer at bygge militære enheder undervejs i starten; eller glemmer at opgradere dem. Man kan sagtens gå fra at være bedste venner med en civ, til pludselig at de går i krig med een, og vælter ind over grænserne med 20 units.
- Sidenote til AI'en... Den er også lidt speciel, hvilket man lærer efterhånden. Prøv evt at have 2 hære, og angrib hhv nord og syd fra... Speciel oplevelse.

Ellers er det ganske morsomt, indimellem, når Vikingerne bygger pyramiderne og Stonehenge. 
Eller når tyskerne bygger Great Wall. 
Eller når Etiopien bomber amerikanerne med ICBM's (Nuclear weapons). 
Eller når Iriquis vinder spacerace.
For ikke at glemme når man får spredt Judaism (religion) til alle andre Civ's, incl. tyskerne.

Alle civ's har nogle bonusser som er udemærket; enkelte kunne dog godt være mere gennemtænkte, men fælles er at det giver nogle gode udfordringer, både som spilleren og når disse er modspillere. At spille mod Egypt, og de har marble, er det et helvede at prøve at bygge wonders. (Egypt har bonus til at bygge wonders med 20%, og Marble giver også bonus til wonders).

Anyway, det er ganske godt og svært tidskrævende spil. Det har mine varmeste anbefalinger.

Great game, tonnes of work put in by the developers incredibly immersive. Combat is not immensely deep but still fun and challenging. Story is told well however you may need a recap if you've not played the previous games as the game does it's best to recap however it's hard to do that with such a massive branching story. Voice acting on Geralt is well done and the NPC's voice acting varies from passable to good. graphics are breathtaking despite the game being relatively old. especially on characters and monsters. The side quests and witcher contacts are also fun and enjoyable all in all a fantastic immersive RPG experience worthy of every penny of the price. 9.5/10

几个变化比较大的点
1.地图的变化
展开说，被囚者的牢房现在通往藏骨堂需要支付1000金币打开门才能通行。猛毒下水道现在四通八达，可以通往藏骨堂、监狱深处、旧下水道和堡垒。而藏骨堂只能通向一张新地图，被遗忘的坟墓。被遗忘的坟墓直接通向墓地。雾霭峡湾地图增加一些可以从高处往下放的藤蔓符文，相当于上去之后可以开捷径，避免重复跑图。
2.新地图被遗忘的墓地和新怪物
为特殊地图，本地图中为黑暗环境。离开光源后身上会携带一团光圈，光圈随着时间缩小。缩至最小后开始扣血。接触到光源后停止扣血并恢复光圈大小。光源有两种，一种是永久性的光源，在商店和传送门旁都可以见到。另一种是一次性光源，触碰后开始发光，发光一段时间后消失。在刚进入地图时会触发新剧情，一段对话（还没有中文，不过挺简单的）。旁边有一个大约4000金币的金门里面有地图特色道具，放置一个一次性的光源，冷却时间一分钟的样子，道具的图标简直就是阿姆斯特朗加速回旋喷气式阿姆斯特朗炮= =。可以选择带上。地图分布有大量传送符文，需要探索地图拿到两把骷髅钥匙才能继续进入有两扇门把守的区域。出现新敌人追踪者（持刀小个子）和纺织者（红斗笠帽子），追踪者一般扎堆分布，攻击方式单一，聚气后砍一刀，伤害比较高，砍两刀翻滚到后面继续砍就可以。纺织者聚气后旋转攻击，尚不知能否盾反，一般砍两刀加一个炸弹或道具快速杀死即可，放不出攻击招式。进入两扇门之后的区域后，会同时面对两个追踪者精英怪，攻击方式和小怪一样，二阶段更频繁可以招小弟。不过这张图很大奖励特别丰富，基本力量和技巧血量都堆上去了。尚且不知两个精英怪仇恨是否联动，不过这个时候莽过去就好。杀死两个精英怪掉落两把钥匙，用来继续打开后面的两扇门，在陷阱中可以得到一个日本靴图纸。之后进入墓地。
3.新武器和武器改动（目前已知的）
新武器：日本靴，快速踢三下，第三下以自身形成球形能量场，击退敌人。尚没用于实战。
弓箭武器伤害大幅增加，有几次次拿到霰弹弩，伤害几乎是同等级主武器（平衡之刃）的四倍。
部分武器攻击动作改动，已知的有胡桃夹子（巨斧）、怨恨之刃、狂暴之刃。怨恨之刃现在跌落神坛，由以前的快速两连抽变成四连击，第三下为腿击有击退效果但是没有伤害就很蛋疼，很断节奏。
巨剑的伤害增强。同等级巨剑比巨斧伤害高四分之一，比平衡之刃高一倍的样子。
4.限时门、商店、道具掉落的改动
每个限时门中加入两个升级卷轴。每个商店固定加入一个升级卷轴，不过无论是卷轴还是道具金币价格都直线上升。越往后的地图价格越高，一万金币一个的道具很常见。金币的掉落增加而道具掉落几率大幅减小，几乎小怪不掉落道具。地图的道具几乎都分布在商店和金门中，少量道具是可以自由拾取的。道具的质量上升，后期的道具几乎一定会携带一个属性+1。
总的来说，制作组的思路是，要不然速通，通过限时门升级，要不然慢慢推图，通过金币购买卷轴升级。不过目前金币购买太贵，如果不调整数据的话，相信速通跑图流会很快崛起。
5.可能的强韧性数据的改变
部分小怪的强韧性可能有改变，比如持盾小怪，现在用普通的盾盾反之后几乎能立即站起身；屠夫（钩子侠）遭受第一次盾反之后没有硬直直接释放第二次攻击，因此现在打屠夫可以是抽抽抽盾反盾反继续抽。其他小怪可能也有改变。
6.守望者攻击方式增加一种，在眼睛四周伸出尖刺刺一下。

总结：本次更新可以说是使游戏变难了，由无双游戏又变回了硬核向。商店价格的上升和道具掉率的降低限制了道具的入手，难以再买买买。我测试了三种路线之后，钱袋由一万变成五千左右。道具的贫乏变相削弱了道具流的战力，因为可能根本随不到想要的核心道具。新地图难度适中，我是初见一遍过的。地图大，奖励非常丰富，走牢房-藏骨堂-新地图-墓地之后的属性（正好一共20点）比走牢房-猛毒下水道-旧下水道-雾霭峡湾-墓地的属性还要高。


2017.6.18
新版本改动之后难度大幅度降低。推荐一种自己摸索出来的无双套路。
配置为出手速度快的武器+任意盾牌+火焰手雷（关键道具）+任意道具。最关键的主手武器buff是火焰伤害+100%。基本上只要凑齐了火焰手雷和一个顺手的武器buff火焰伤害+100%就可以全程无双，基本不费血瓶。其他的buff可以选择叠一叠属性或者喷一下油，另外死亡爆毒雾的buff也很好用。属性点的话，血量和力量加到6-7，剩下的才给技巧。对道具的输出要求不高，主要取一个减CD作用
这个打法的特点就是莽，很爽，推图也快，容错率也不低。注意每个商店都去瞧一眼，基本到港口左右就能凑齐。

简单点评一下武器，
平衡刀：很中庸的武器，出手很快但是五连后有一个后摇，没有特殊效果
双匕首：比较好用，抬手有前摇，第三刀暴击伤害爆炸
碎颅锤：比较好用，起手较慢，攻击范围大，75%血量的敌人必定眩晕，时间还挺长。打法主要是抢先手眩晕后三连一套带走
刺客匕首：前期好用，后期慎重。抬手迅速，背刺暴击伤害优秀，缺点是面对扎堆小怪难以发挥作用，守望者没试过用匕首能不能触发背刺
大剑：很帅，然而抬手太慢了实用性不强
血之刃、油腻之剑：抬手很慢很蛋疼，用起来很不舒服，不如大剑利索
刺剑：虽然被削了仍然很好用，翻滚+刺击手感很好
狂暴之刃：攻击动作很舒服，前期可以用一用，后期血量还是比较重要的，容易一击被秒
火把：新版本大幅加强，攻击后可以点燃附近的地面，前摇变短。推图很不错，打boss比较乏力
怨恨之刃：个人最喜欢的武器，没有之一。抬手迅速，攻击动作干净利落。受伤后必定暴击，非常适合去莽。吸血速度非常快。
长矛：抬手略有延迟，复数敌人暴击，可以一用，不过很一般，看个人需求吧
刺矛：抬手快，距离长。怼到墙后造成暴击，暴击条件很苛刻。总的说不实用。
电鞭：可以一用，其他流派可能用的比较多。在非水环境一次只能攻击单数敌人，还容易被环境的瓶瓶罐罐干扰，莽不起来。
长鞭：谁能摸索出距离来谁去用吧= =，上限高但是下限低。
其他武器和弓箭几乎不用。
盾牌新版本大幅度加强，受到攻击后有了无敌时间，极大增加容错率，再也不会被一套秒掉啦。盾反也很简单实用。遗憾的是仍然没能摸索出来破盾的条件，有时候被钩子哥一下破盾就很伤。同样的原因打boss几乎不用盾反，翻滚就行。
打第一个boss很简单，初见一次过也很正常，就不废话了。
第二个boss初见会麻烦一点，再加上原因不明的掉帧现象，会很烦。循环眼睛阶段+触手阶段三次即可。比较有威胁的一招是触手的冲浪，朝冲浪方向翻滚即可。眼睛阶段的冲撞前摇很长，翻滚即可，喷毒的时候注意走位，保持血量即可。掉帧就没办法了。推荐技能带闪现+火焰手雷。打它的套路就是手雷上燃烧buff，闪现过去砍砍砍，很快进入触手阶段。触手阶段等触手伸出地面后瞎几把扔火焰手雷+闪现攻击，很容易就过了。
估计下个版本火焰伤害要削弱，盾牌的无敌时间也要削弱（大误）

**จั่วหัวไว้ก่อนว่าที่เขียนรีวิวนี้จริงๆอยากเขียนให้เข้าใจมากกว่าว่าเกมไม่ได้ยากอย่างที่คิด 
และตอนเขียนรีวิวนั้นผมยังไม่เคยเล่น ภาค 1 2 และ DLC ภาค3 เลยเปรีบยเทียบไม่ได้ว่ามันยากกว่าภาคก่อนๆแค่ไหน**

Dark souls 3 เป็นเกมที่เน้นใช้ความจำอย่างมาก โดยเราต้องจำท่าโจมตีของบอส
ซึ่งถ้าเราจำท่าได้หมดก็อีซี่หลบได้สบายๆแต่กว่าจะจำได้ก็ตายไปเยอะเหมือนกัน
บอสแต่ละตัวมีจุดแข็งจุดอ่อนไม่เหมือนกัน การเปลี่ยนวิธีเล่นก็ทำให้สู้บอสได้ง่ายขึ้น
เช่นบอสบางตัวต้องใช้โลห์สู้ บางตัวต้องเน้นตีไวออกไว บางตัวเน้นฟาดแรงๆเน้นๆ หรือบางตัวแพ้ไฟก็ใช้อาวุธเคลือบไฟสู้ เป็นต้น
อีกอย่างที่สำคัญคือเกมนี้มีความเป็น RPG พอสมควร ถ้าคุณสู้บอสไม่ไหวลองไปเก็บเวลสักหน่อยแล้วกลับมาใหม่ก็ทำให้สู้ง่ายขึ้น
หรือถ้าเล่นไม่ไหวจริงๆก็ยังสามารถซัมม่อนผู้เล่นคนอื่นมาช่วยตีได้
ที่ยากของเกมนี้จะเป็นศัตรูตามทางมากกว่า เพราะมันชอบมาเป็นฝูง อีกทั้งอาวุธเราถ้าไม่ตีช้าก็ระยะตีแคบ ทำให้โดนรุมได้ง่าย 
ส่วน DLC ยังไม่ได้เล่นแต่เขาบอกว่า DLC นี่แหละนรกของจริง เดี๋ยวถ้าเล่นแล้วจะมาแก้รีวิวใหม่

ทางด้านเนื้อเรื่องแนะนำให้เปิดคลิปสรุปเนื้อเรื่องไปแล้วก็เล่นตามไปจะอินกว่า เพราะเกมไม่บอกเนื้อเรื่องเราตรงๆแต่จะบอกตามบรรยากาศ สถานที่ ไอเทม และคำพูดอันแสนกำกวมของNPC ซึ่งเราต้องตีความเองด้วยว่ากำลังพูดถึงอะไรกัน

-ข้อดี-
-สนุกเล่นเพลิน ท้าทายสุดๆ 
-เพลงเพราะ 
-ดีไซน์ต่างๆดีมาก ทั้งบอส แผนที่ อาวุธ ชุด สกิล
-การเล่น Co-op กับคนแปลกหน้าถือเป็นเรื่องบันเทิงมาก ช่วยกันตีบอสมันส์ๆ

-ข้อเสีย-
-ถึงแม้จะเล่นด้วยคีย์บอร์ดแต่เกมมันจะโชว์ปุ่มของจอยXboxแทนแป้นพิมพ์ ทำให้เราต้องไปดูที่ตั้งค่าว่าปุ่มนี้มันคือปุ่มไรแล้วก็จำเอา
(สำหรับคนที่ไม่มีจอย ผมลองมาทั้งจอยกับคีย์บอร์ดแล้วก็เล่นได้ทั้งสบายๆทั้งคู่นะ ) 
-มุมกล้องอันชวนปวดหัวในบางครั้ง ซึ่งมักจะเป็นครั้งที่สำคัญเสมอ เช่นการสู้กับบอสบางตัว
-ระบบ Co-op สุดประหลาดที่ไม่ใช้การสร้างห้องหรือกดจอยเซิฟแบบปกติ แต่เป็นการวางสัญลักษณ์อัญเชิญให้คนอื่นมาช่วยตามจุดนั้นๆ และถ้าตายก็ต้องเชิญใหม่ซึ่ง ส่วนใหญ่เราจะไม่ได้เชิญคนเดิมแน่นอนเพราะคนมันสุ่มเรื่อยๆ และถ้าจะเล่นกับเพื่อนต้องใส่รหัสผ่านให้ตรงกันเพื่อให้เห็นสัญลักษณ์ของเพื่อน และถ้าเล่น Co-op เกมจะเพิ่มโอกาสโดนอินเวด(โดนบุกโลก) ทำให้ต้องPVPกับผู้เล่นอื่นเป็นระยะๆ ถ้าอยากเล่นชิวๆกับเพื่อนเรื่อยๆก็น่าผิดหวังน่อย
-ต่อจากข้อที่แล้ว ด้วยความที่ว่าเกมมันนานแล้ว คนเล่นก็มีเฉลี่ยแค่ 7k-10k คนต่อวัน และคนส่วนใหญ่ก็ไปกระจุกที่ช่วง end game ทำให้การขอความช่วยเหลือช่วงต้นเกมค่อนข้างยาก เพราะงั้นพยายามด้วยตัวเองดีกว่า

Сейчас пиксельные игры не все принимают всерьёз... Но эта игра по настоящему крута и брутальна! Это 2D мясорубка, в которой вы будете умирать, умирать и еще раз умирать. Как бы это не звучало иронично, но в игре есть даже достижение связанное со смертями, а именно умереть 1000 раз. Это достаточно сложная и интересная игра за счет своего сюжета, и интересной, и незамысловатой боёвки. Сюжет крайне загадочен и интересен. По сути, вы играете за наёмного киллера, которому дают зашифрованные послания (заказы на убийства), что-то типа, угомони непослушных детишек, или же прийди и очисть дом от тараканов. Игра держит игроков в очень сильном напряжение до конца игры. Музыка. Музыка здесь безупречна... 
Хотя звучит довольно просто, но все таки в ней есть что-то такое. Советую всем поиграть. Не пожалеете потраченного на нее времени! 8/10

An awesome open world game that takes you through the first person perspective of Kyle Crane, an undercover agent who was sent to infiltrate a quarantine zone in the zombie-ridden city of Harran. This game has a dynamic day and night cycle, with many climbable structures that supports a seamless parkour system. This game is mostly focused on weapons-based combat, ranging from close range melee to long range guns/bows & arrows. While there is a main story line, there are also an abundance of side quests that you can deviate to doing that takes you through some sub stories of the survivors. There are also challenges you can play either against the game or against your friends. I'd recommend playing the game with friends to have a great time and many shenanigans, although playing solo can also be fun and rewarding.

艺术的游戏与游戏的艺术。
首先，我得承认第九艺术也是艺术形式，所以游戏也都是艺术品，只不过分水准罢了。那生化奇兵就是最能代表第九艺术的艺术品之一。
我只玩到了中期就写评测，所以剧情不做太多评价，但是，充满荒诞但又符合逻辑的情节着实引人入胜。循着剧情的足迹展开萝莉与大叔的冒险，从而展示充满想象力的奇幻世界。每一个场景都精雕细琢，并且几乎不会在游戏流程中看到重复的场景，时刻让我保持对这个世界的好奇。不仅如此，整个世界富有生机，富人区的繁华，贫民窟的破旧，随着人的一举一动，变得活了起来，你则是这个世界搅局者，穿越这繁华的城市挖掘其深入的黑暗。复古的音乐也让蒸汽朋克的风格更为突出。
作为生化奇兵，拥有超能力也是理所应当，这也是同其他FPS游戏区别开的特色之一。游戏中的超能力与生物技术密不可分，每个能力都看似朴素，实则致命。
虽然全程也是突突突，但是上述的超能力系统，以及开阔浮动城市使其又变得不同。本来浮动城市应该在画面中说，但是放在这里说，我一定要赞叹一下‘’铁轨‘’这个设计，铁轨的存在让游戏中主角活动范围更大，而且开阔场景中的战斗又不显得混乱，反而还能抓住游戏的节奏。并且搭成铁轨穿行在天空中又格外的震撼。除了这些，你的小萝莉随时还会给你原著，子弹没有了，她有时候会给你子弹，去了便利店，发现没有钱，随即丢给你几枚硬币。总之，你不会因为有了小萝莉而感觉像是生化危机4的那种累赘感。这些设计给大好评。
哦对了，忘了说，这个游戏在欣赏剧情和游戏难度间也是做了很好的平衡，首先就是你死了之后不用读档回到之前的状态，而是在附近复活，但是根据难度不同，敌人也会回复一定的生命，死后的代价是扣除金钱。这就让即使不会玩射击游戏的玩家也能流畅的欣赏剧情，会玩FPS也能在高难度下得到挑战。
虽然我承认这游戏在各方面都很优秀，但是还是有一些不足，这就出在了战斗系统上。首先，手感上确实很好是毋庸置疑的。不过这个游戏给了丰富的武器和超能力，但是大部分都是鸡肋，实用性强的很少，可能是制作组为了还原朴素的超能力，但是游戏的玩法还是突突突，而且超能力也全都是用来战斗，能力不好用，大部分人都不会强迫自己使用吧。而且有了小萝莉之后，你就不用愁子弹了，这样就是捡到了好用的枪，就能一直用，比如我一开始就用了火箭筒，到中期觉得太强才换的武器。
虽然我也说了一些游戏的不好，但是总归还是一个好游戏，毕竟游戏也不可能面面俱到。十个小时(不带DLC)的流程伴随丰富的剧情也把握的恰到好处。总之，玩一遍不会很花时间，好好享受就是了。

I had a great time with this. The controls feel just like quake and it does lots of its own new things. It feels like you're playing a game just like quake, and not a rip-off or living in its shadow. A fantastic game in its own right.

The level design is really good. It's always throwing interesting, fresh levels at you and are all laid out super well so you don't get lost. One in particular is really cool with its changing layout. Levels are short and sweet - never feeling like they drag on or are rushed

Weapons are fun to shoot and are nice and varied. I particularly like how the crossbow works, but I love shooting dual lever-arched shotguns the most

It's also surprisingly spooky. I felt very uneasy playing this a fair amount and I think that's great

Изначально был очень скептически настроен по поводу этой игры, но несмотря на тонны технических проблем, cейчас, спустя 24+ часов, хочу всё-таки поделиться своим мнением.

Положительные моменты:
- несмотря на то, что кажется поначалу, что боёвка очень примитивная, ближе к концу игры прям как в Год оф Варе смачно нарезаешь всё живое
- неплохой сюжет и хорошие некоторые кат-сцены
- музыкальное оформление, хоть и минималистичное, но приятное
- интересные и полезные длц, хоть тут авторам пазлов кто-то дал волю и они выдали уровни местами лучше чем в основной игре

То, что могло быть лучше:
- игра бюджетная, переиспользуется много всего и часто (но если честно, увидев все локации, не особо считаю это прям большим минусом, разнообразия хватает)
- игра иногда крашится
- видно, особенно по началу, как при повороте камеры прогружаются геометрия уровня и текстуры
- сворачивание игры приводило местами к фотомоду, когда вроде бы пауза спала, но худа нет, всё кроме камеры замороженное, были и другие рандомные гличи, ломающие логику
- пару раз очень сильно заблудился или не понимал куда идти, компас показывал туда, куда невозможно было пройти
- перегруженная система прокачки, особенно на русской локализации, когда почти все кристаллы для улучшения называются одинаково %)

в итоге при наличии приемлемой для Вас скидки стоит имхо взять, крайне мало хороших и продуманных, пусть и бюджетных, игр в таком жанре выходит в последнее время

Does not worth a single penny. For the same price you could easily grab Elite:Dangerous Commander's Pack (With all elite content + extras) and have at least 10 times the fun than this. I am not saying that Elite is a good space sim. But even Elite is 10 times better than this. 

No wait... even X-Rebirth is a better space sim than this. With this line you should have understood how bad this game is...

- Poor Content. Unpopulated Universe. Repetitive Assets (Creatures, Sounds, Spaceships). You can land on galactic space stations only to find out that you are the only alive thing on them. Empty bars, empty corridors... The only aliens you can talk with in a station are those who occasionally land just like you. And they stay in their spaceships so you basically talk with a spaceship. Spaceships are all the same with at most 10-15 different mesh models. They even have the exact same weapons the only thing different is the size of their cargo (slot) space. Weapons are the same. 3-5 different weapon mesh models with exactly the same type of weapon.

- Exploration is not rewarding and uninteresting. When you spot living alien creatures on planet you can scan them with the F button... only to get 200 money and some text box explaining the creatures properties. And they call this exploration.

- Ship controls are really stupid. You can not descend with your ship below some threshold on planets. It is very easy to land (just press e) but at the same time almost impossible to land on a point you desire. 

- Very poorly optimized. I have a 4 Gb GTX 980 and 8 GB i7 3.2 Ghz and I get frequent spikes as I turn around in a planet no matter how I reduce the graphics settings.

- Worst toon like shaded game I've ever seen. When you are flying in space its more like you are flying in a giant swiss cheese than space.

- The game becomes unavoidably boring and unplayable after the first 3-4 hours. And after that you will lose your chance to refund just like I did.

Uninstall - restart PC - and reinstall, still same result. 
Issued refund request to steam to avoid further disappointment.

Я знатно посмеялся, перенерничал, а также начал своё разложение т.к. я провожу за чтением визуальных новелл всё больше и больше времени. Честно, я не знаю будет ли хоть кто-то читать то что я написал. Однако, если вы не ровнодушный и у вас есть лишие деньги на счету то не поленитесь и купите эту игру ОНА ТОГО СТОИТ я гарантирую. Это нихера не рекламма,мне не платили, я просто диванный критик который изредка любит провести время за прочтением хорошей визуалки. Надеюсь, что и вы сможите испытать тоже, что и я при прочтении. ПЖ не качайте пиратку лишь по причине того, что авторы реально сторались. Закладывали в код, рисунки и музыку частичку себя.

Been playing this game for 6 or 7 years. when i bought my pc this was of the first games i had to get. i've loved the game and would recommend to any of my friends, and family, also would recommend to anyone who likes boss oriented, rng, pixelated games.

At first, I saw this game pop up in the front page and stuff and thought, oh no, another Terraria-like game.  And look, the characters do emotes and they look like FFVI emotes, but they're just so exaggerated, and ew.

Then, I saw someone play it in the background of a YouTube video while talking about other stuff, and I noticed Oh!  Wait!  It actually has a STORY?  And NPCs that actually do stuff?  And all of a sudden, I was very interested.

Finally, I tried it, and oh my goodness.  It's very cute, very fun, you can really do whatever you want in it - enjoying the gathering, enjoying the farming sim, enjoying the NPC engagement, enjoying the adventuring (although this game's combat is by no means a "refined combat system", it's kind of a balancing challenge with your exploration/gathering), enjoying petting your dog or cat, or even just looking around.  And now you can even multiplay it, which makes things even more interesting.  Gives a lot of potential ^_^

Overall I do love and enjoy this game.  I highly recommend it for those who can only play a little bit of Terraria at a time, or who like farming sim games but would like something more out of them.  I'm sure there are other things I should be saying here after all this time playing it, but.... I can't think of them right now.

5 Liraya 5 Yıl önce almıştım. Hikayesi 15 saat. Co op bi o kadar daha gider.

很多人抱怨这个游戏不适合PF规则新手，设计的有问题如何如何，简单模式也会被搞如何如何……说的也都有一定的道理，但是很少有人真正给新手能够玩下去的建议，即使有，无非就是什么“抱蛮子的大腿”或者“抱双姐妹的大腿“这种具体提议，事实上没有掌握思路，抱了两次大腿过了几张图，下一张图大腿瘸了，立刻又玩不下去了。所以我在这里给想入坑的新人说几个真正容易被忽略的点，希望能够有所帮助。

在此之前，你必须知道，作为一个跑团规则，其实PF直接搬上电脑游戏是有很多不适应的，拥王者已经优化了大多数问题让这个规则适应了电脑游戏，但是有些问题仍旧没有能够避免。在桌上跑团，基本不可能一个地图上几十二十只怪给你打，纯踢门团也不会，但是电脑游戏就会，而且会堆怪……新手村看门boss鹿王图里面十几二十个人，每个人需要5-8个骰子来处理战斗，合下来就是上百个骰子，大家等级都差不多，早期那些怪力乱神逆转战局的技能法术装备你也没有，所以这些骰子里出现了一个大失败可能你就陷入困境万劫不复了（碰巧这游戏大失败还巨多）。所以在早期，骰子姬出问题不是你的错，后面每人每回合攻击好几次甚至十几次，装备免疫这个免疫那个时候，骰子姬的作用就会逐渐减少。所以你真正需要考虑的不是如何避免被骰子姬背刺，处理骰子姬的背刺你需要的是读盘而不是策略，你应该思考如何快速的走到”后期”去让骰子姬不再重要。

所以新手需要注意的第一条是“不叠加”。让骰子姬不再重要的最直接的方式就是直接+20……那些个+1+1看起来很厉害，需要注意大多数相同装备效果是不叠加的，防御等级Armor Class的几项加值，偏斜、护甲、天生防御这些只有一个装备能生效，当你装备了两个+2偏斜戒指你的AC只能+2偏斜而不是+4。这条适用于PF规则包括其他DND和类DND规则的几乎一切数值，比如你的几项豁免。但是因为不同的种类加值相互是不冲突的，所以你如果你觉得自己某个数值特别少，特别需要骰子姬青睐，你应该做的是找更多类别的加值。比如你觉得自己AC少了，不要想方设法把你身上的偏斜+1换成+2，那真很难很贵，而是找一个偏斜+1，再去找一个天生防御+1，再去找一个护甲+1，这都很简单……后面到了+2的等级，你自然就轻松找到各种+2了

其次是要注意“对应”。所有跑团规则游戏，最烦的时候大概就是你研究了半天如何做一个出色的匕首贼，正准备用那个狗头人来试刀，突然对面放了一个让你画面卡顿丢帧丢到鼠标都找不到的法术，然后你就不能攻击了……你用赶紧让牧师对你用解除魔法，结果发现把自己的力量buff解了，人还是不能攻击……万念俱灰之下你的鼠标点到人身上一看，两个字：“反胃”这个时候大概你是真的想反胃。但是其实，大多数状态都是有几乎是完全对应的解法的，而且这些解法都是早期，五级之前就能拿到的。比如林翠出门就能学的移除恐惧就足够解决几乎大多数恐惧。很多法术效果在后面都会写上“反制某某法术”或者"被某某法术反制，只要找到对应就能轻松应对。高等级的施法者更是能够一次性解除多项负面效果，比如牧师的治愈术，所以多带一点反制类的法术，不要总把目光投向火球和闪电。至于刚才提到的恶心，虽然你不能干这个不能干那个，但是你是可以移动的，只要跑出臭云区域，反胃就解除了。

最后，也是最重要的是，除了魔法效果的“对应”，怪物的解法也是有对应的，当然说“对应”不是很严谨，因为并不像法术那样一一对应相互反制，但是一般解法是有的，比如大家都知道的巨魔怕狂笑。所以开战之前看看敌人的3防，意志薄弱就法术控制，反射弧长的就陷阱坑害，韧性不强的就擒抱按倒。所谓的新人杀手蜘蛛群，物理免疫魔法减伤，但是扔手榴弹（炽火胶）或者酸液瓶就一招制敌；各种妖精、无面女，难打的要命，基本免疫任何控制，武器根本打不到她们，但是她们都长着两条小细腿，一个油腻就再也站不起来了；什么异界怪兽位面恶魔这种魑魅魍魉在这个世界作威作福，放逐术送他们回家，在老家他们什么都不是。

别的游戏里你学到的那些“体大弱门毛多怕火”在这里都适用，只是PF的世界要素更多，但是只要你花点时间，愿意弄明白，你就会知道他们并不复杂，只是量多而已，它们并不是大学生的高等数学，而是量很大的小学生四则运算。所有怪物用在你身上的东西，你仔细看看，观察一下自己那些人中招了，为什么没能防住，那些人没中招，为什么防住了，然后可以全部把它们用在敌人身上。

~~Phoneix mod is special because it adds over 80 planets,each with it's own planetary bonus,
and you can upgrade them(thats not in base game)

the base game..

~2015 got new PC that can finally run Phoenix Rising mod and i lost interest..

app_name: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim Special Edition
review: 最爱的游戏没有之一

Tato hra mě potěšila mnoha důvody.
1. Dobrá Hratelnost - Hratelnost dává smysl a není unfair, jako mnoho lidí říká.
2. Humor a Reference - Pravděpodobně nejlepší hra na reference na ostatní hry a filmy ( podle mě ), jinak humor se zdá snesitelný a ne cringe, jak to často bývá.
3. Grafika + Artstyle - célá hra je dělaná stylem Pixelart ( kresleno pomocí pixelů) ) a nějakým divným důvodem je hodně lákavý a sedí do celé atmosféry hry.
Tato hra mě nepotěšila z jednoho důvodu.
1. Obtížnost - řekl jsem, že není unfair, ale to neznamená, že je lehká. Spadá mezi hry jako Dark Souls, ve kterých se mechanyky hry musíte učit dlouhou dobu, aby jste porazili aspoň prvního bosse. U ETG to platí Dvojnásobně, jelikož se jednotlivé průchody neukládají, a tak si často stejným peklem projdete vícekrát. Jak můžete vidět, na této hře 313 hodin, a před 8 hodinami jsem celou hru dohrál na 100%, takže když říkám, že je obtížná, tak je.
´´CELKOVÉ HODNOCENÍ´´= Enter the Gungeon je Výborná Hra, a doufám, že se jí dostane více popularity, jelikož podobné hry by měli být hodně známé, za mě | 4.8/5 |  ROZHODNĚ DOPORUČUJI

[h1]The Greatest Zombie Game Ever![/h1]

It's an ARPG medieval zombie game.

So you, as a failed biotech human trial test subject (and has some degree of zombie immunity due to this), enters the world of medieval zombie apocalypse. The Sunbrella company wants you to retrieve [strike]five[/strike]four lost human trial test subjects in order to finish the big experiment (that has been done over and over) to save humanity.

You could either [spoiler]a) Do as you are told and go find all the test subjects which will eventually all merge into you. Then you will become the ultimate test subject. After you throw yourself in a big cauldron, the world is saved (for now), and so is the company/establishment. Hooray[/spoiler]. Or you could [spoiler]b) Bribe the [strike]waifu[/strike]secretary Sunbrella assigned to you with black pearls so she will help you terminate the biochemical reactions at the last minute. The world is doomed. Oh no[/spoiler]. Or worse, you [spoiler]mounted on her and took her precious while she was helping you. As she lies helplessly on the ground you snatched the valuable bio-power of the company for yourself. Dope[/spoiler]. Lastly, you could [spoiler]c) Accept the zombie virus (and new waifu) from Sunbrella's competitor company and go through all the stuff for that company and then eventually you become the Lord of Zombies! Sweet[/spoiler].

TL;DR: Try finger but whole.

Онлайн-песочница, в которой игроку предстоит выживать в жестоком мире, где на него будут нападать дикие животные и другие игроки.

Помимо поисков вещей и сражений игрок может заняться и другими делами: поохотиться, собрать оружие из подручных средств и при желании построить себе дом или даже крепость.


Для крафта игроку придется добывать ресурсы, которые нужны для создания оружия, одежды, патронов, аптечек и так далее. Изначально игрок умеет делать лук, бинты, одежду из ткани и другие базовые предметы, но для мощного автомата или бронежилета нужно изучить чертежи, которые не так-то просто отыскать.Заходите в эту игру и вы не пожелеите что купили её))

Pro

Research and dinos done on global level, can restart island without losing anything.

Con:
People are only there to make you money, they don't have any needs or any information on them.
Can't que research.
You NEED the other islands to unlock everthing.
No challenge mode.

Лучший стелс: У охранников периодически включается симулятор мунволка или генератор рандомных направлений - все для того, чтобы усложнить игру! Если ты играешь на DS и над охранником появился "!", то "прощай обойма", потому что охранник превращается в Халка, которого не берут пули.
Лучшая боевка: хочешь достижения DS OD? Ты теперь мышка, которая бегает от щели к щели, надеясь, что в тебя не попадет случайная пуля. Хочешь убить джагера? Доставай все накопленные деньги, ведь боезапаса для их убийства хватит на истребление города. Отошел от команды? Лови ногой по лицу и новый самый неприятный звук, который будет сниться вам в кошмарах. 
Лучший симулятор вскрытия: Ты хочешь поставить дрель? Она того не хочет. И будет ломаться. Каждые. Десять. Секунд. Ты играешь на DS? Тогда тебе помогут только лебеди, запевающие на фоне. Как говорится - "Drill you f***cking piece of shit!"

On the surface, this game is just stunning, beautiful art. As one reviewer put it, you could literally take *any* frame of this game and use it as your desktop. 

But Gris is so, so, much more. The use of color to navigate through the 5 stages of grief is phenomenal, and as the game progresses, each of these colors stays throughout the journey of our heroine, fading in and out, acting as splashes and reminders of the different ways in which we grieve and the things we learn by processing grief itself. 

The music is hauntingly beautiful, with swells that made me alternate between relaxed and sobbing my eyes out with emotion. 

If you like twitchy games where there's permadeath on the line, Gris will make you rage quit--- but you might enjoy watching someone else play it cause it's just so pretty. 

If you're a puzzle solver who hates the need for a fast trigger finger, you'll probably like this one.

Açıkcası oyunu ilk alırken şüphelerim vardı harita üzerinden nasıl strateji oynunu olur.Çünkü bizler age oflarla mount and blade lerle büyüyen bir nesiliz.O savaş atmosferini,savaş aksiyonlarını hissetmen gerek.Ve en son Civilization V oynamışız beklentilerimiz gayet yüksek ve hayliyle tuhaf bakıyoruz.Ama şunu söylemek gerekirse oyuna girdiğim andan itibaren atmosfer olsun oynanışlık olsun herşey mükemmel. ilk Osmanlı ile başladım tabi sonuç olarak Osmanlı torunlarıyız herkes Osmanlının gücünü göstermek isteyecek ama şunuda söyleyeyim sadece Osmanlı ile oynamayın avrupa tarafı olsun kore tarafı olsun her ülke birbirinden keyifle hele birda arkadaşlarla oynayınca saatin kaç olduğunu unutup bi anda bakıyorsunuz sabah olmuş.Mutlaka alıp oynamanızı öneririm.Ama bi yandan oynayıp bi yandanda videolar izleyip öğrenirseniz daha iyi olur çünkü oyun baya bi ayrıntılı en ufak bir şeyi kaçırırsanız bu sizin için kötü sonuçlanabilir.

Fun game with friends.

This is the result of when love for a project and hard work get together. This little gem is probably the best Co'op multiplayer game I've played in the last years, and one of the best I've ever played. Everything in this game from it's gameplay to it's level randomizer, to the loot, activities, missions and even little quality of life details it has are simply outstanding and quite polished for an early access.

It's amazing how much you can do with so little, passion just leads to amazing things, and you can see the developers are very passionate about this game, constantly listening to the community and patching it through and through to fix it's problems. Not to say that it doesn't have it's flaws of course, but it's virtues outdo so much of it's flaws that I simply fall flat and ignore them most of the time.

For me this game is already worth more than 99% of every other early access games and it's a big big big slap in the face to a lot of AAA developers that with much more resources just can't achieve this.
I can only see an even brighter future for this game.

This is one of my favorite games of all time. The story is fantastic with a great twist at the end. The combat mechanics get a little repetitive, but this game is so much fun to play. Bioshock 2 was my favorite of the series as well.

Dying Light est un jeu de zombies au style réaliste mélangeant plus ou moins les principes de Mirror's Edge pour tout ce qui est parcours, et.... (évidemment la comparaison semble inévitable) Left 4 Dead pout tout ce qui se rapporte de près ou de loin aux zombies. Néanmoins ce jeu est bien plus réaliste qu'un Left 4 Dead. En effet, du moins au début du jeu vaincre un zombie n'est pas chose aisé... alors je ne parle même pas de vaincre une horde entière. Même une fois le jeu bien avancé, il est toujours possible de mourir rapidement face à un zombie, ce qui diverge totalement de la licence Left 4 Dead. Il est d'ailleurs bien souvent conseillé d'éviter les zombies p'us que de leurs faire face, ce qui rajoute un réalisme très intéressant. Je ne suis pas le public cible de ce jeu. Ce qui m'a attiré en achetant ce jeu, c'est la possibilité de faire la campagne en multijoueur jusqu'à 4 joueurs. Assez nostalgique de ma periode Left 4 Dead, j'espérais retrouver les mêmes sensations que sur ce dernier très réussi. Néanmoins je ne me suis que très peu renseigné quant à ce jeu lors de mon achat, ce qui m'a alors surpris en découvrant un jeu réaliste et surtout en monde totalement ouvert. Je n'ai par conséquent pas retrouvé les mêmes sensations que sur Left 4 Dead, mais des sensations différentes qui n'en sont pas moins intéressantes.

Au niveau du scénario, c'est pas vraiment intéressant on va pas se le cacher. On joue un personnage assez peu intéressant (à tel point que j'ai oublié son nom) qui rejoins un groupe d'hommes qui peinent à résister aux incessantes attaques de zombies. Mais ce personnage n'est pas un saint puisque celui ci travaille secrètement pour le gouvernement qui a pour but de récupérer les informations sur un potentiel vaccin dans un objectif assez obscur. Par conséquent on a assez peu de sympathie pour ce personnage qui se fait utiliser tel un pantin qui ne cesse d'accumuler les mauvaises décisions. C'est néanmoins agréable de le voir se rebeller contre ses manipulateurs même si cela n'arrive que très tard. En terme de personnage secondaire, aucun personnage ne sort réellement du lot mais forcé de constater qu'on finit par en apprécier certains. On a donc alors quelques surprises scénaristiques avec la mort surprises de certain personnages. Par ailleurs, lorsque l'on termine l'histoire, on se concentre alors sur les quêtes secondaires. Le jeu perd alors tout son côté réaliste lorsque l'on peut observer au cours des dialogues avec les personnages, le fait qu'ils évoquent des personnages décédés dans l'intrigue principale comme si ils étaient vivant, et encore plus fort, il arrive de voir en vie des personnages que l'on a laissé aux portes de la mort venir nous parler comme si il ne s'était rien passé. Une dernière chose concernant les personnages, le casting est réussi en terme de doublage français puisque l'on retrouve des professionnels du doublages que l'on a déjà entendu dans d'autres jeux ou mêmes séries. Le problème est que ce casting est extrêmement réduit, et par conséquent au vu du nombre impressionnant de personnages secondaires, certains doubleurs doublent parfois plus de 5 personnages (au delà du doublage, le visuel de certains personnages est très ressemblant au visuel d'un autre, notamment pour les enfants) . Ah bah forcément c'est tout de suite moins réalistes. Visuellement le jeu est réaliste et un ordinateur peu puissant peut réussir à le faire tourner sans grand soucis. Ce visuel se combine parfaitement avec l'ambiance sonore du jeu. Pas vraiment de musique mémorable, mais des bruitage au top. Au niveau du Gameplay, là ça pêche. On a certes une grande capacité de mouvement que l'on étoffe en jouant à l'aide d'un arbre d'amélioration. Le problème est que lorsqu'on joue à la manette, on a l'impression que certains boutons ont été placés n'importe où. Notamment le saut qui se situe sur le bouton RB (celui sous la gâchette droite). C'est assez contre intuitif, alors que le mettre sur le bouton A aurait été bien plus logique. Au lieu de ça sur le bouton A on a quelque chose qu'on aurait pu retrouver sur le bouton RB, c'est à dire examiner les environs. Au fait, je ne sais pas si c'est propre au jeu de zombies puisque cela été déjà le cas sur Final Exam, mais LE STICK NE DOIT PAS ÊTRE UTILISÉ EN TEMPS QUE BOUTON! À nouveau pour courir, il est nécessaire d'appuyer sur le stick droit, ce qui est assez insupportable au bout d'un court instant. Au delà de ça, les phases d'escalades sont assez chaotiques à prendre en main...

Là où j'ai été très agréablement surpris, c'est au niveau des décors. L'univers dans lequel progresse notre protagoniste est vraiment un réussite. On a deux endroits où progresser, le bidonville dans un premier temps puis la vieille ville aux architectures verticales totalement différentes du premier monde. Le monde ouvert a dans ce jeu un véritable intérêt puisque le joueur n'est pas contraint de réaliser certaines quêtes et non d'autres. Les villes offrent un terrain de jeu très vastes avec divers événements tous intéressants il faut l'admettre. Au delà des quêtes proposer par les personnages, la ville offre la possibilité de sauver des survivants, de récupérer des caisses aériennes larguées, ou nettoyer une zone pour en faire un endroit sûr. On retrouve également régulièrement la possibilité de lancer une compétition avec ces amis. Ces compétitions sont généralement des courses d'obstacles à travers la ville, une compétition pour celui qui tuera le plus de zombies, ou une compétition pour celui qui volera le plus d'objets. Cette ville offre donc un contenu très riche, mais malheureusement ce monde ouvert possède de trop nombreux murs invisibles. En effet, parfois le personnage peut sauter à quatre mètres de lui pour atteindre une plateforme, et parfois un mur invisible l'empêche d'en atteindre une à moins d'un mètre. Ces murs sont encore plus fréquent lors de l'utilisation du grappin puisque celui se désactive totalement lorsque l'in pointe une surface que le joueur n'est pas supposé atteindre, du moins pas avec le grappin. Certes ces moments ne sont pas très courants mais ils se font de plus en plus fréquent sur la fin du jeu. Parlons rapidement des quêtes que propose le jeu. Le jeu a un contenu très généreux lorsque l'on cumule les quêtes principales et secondaires. En ce qui concerne l'histoire principale, le prologue n'est jouable qu'en solo ce qui est totalement compréhensible. Après tout il est normal que le joueur doit comprendre seule les mécanismes de jeu. Ce qui est inexcusable, c'est le fait que la fin du jeu ne soit uniquement jouable en solo. Sérieusement alors que cela fait 20 heures que la campagnes en multi a commencé, il fait vivre la clôture de l'histoire individuellement. Un choix franchement incompréhensible, qui pour moi ne fait qu'illustrer une flemme des développeurs de proposer un fin en multi. En plus, la conclusion de ce scénario laisse sérieusement quelque peu à désirer. Et je ne parle même pas de la blague que nous ont fait les développeurs en proposant un combat final qui se déroule en QTE. Une fois cette histoire achevée, il faut s'attarder aux quêtes secondaires (déjà dispos pour la plupart depuis le début du jeu). Ces quêtes sont de qualités très honorables, mais forcés d'observer qu'elles se répètent quand même beaucoup. En effet, c'est toujours : Ho j'ai tellement besoin d'un truc, tu pourrais aller dans la zone désaffectée entourés de zombies à 600 mètres d'ici pour récupérer ce truc?
Heureusement le monde ouvert offre des environnements assez variés permettant de contrer la redondances de ces quêtes. Enfin, on a également la possibilité de faire des primes. Et on va pas se cacher que c'est vraiment le truc qu'ils ont rajouté au dernier moment pour rallonger la durée de vie du jeu. 

Conclusion: Bon jeu avec un contenu très riche malheureusement gâchés pas des défauts qui font tâches. (Conclusion soft, sorry mais je suis a la limite de caractères Steam!)
Note: 15,5/20

This is only a hair short of a masterpiece and a major step forward for the genre.

I delayed buying this because of mixed reviews, but now I can't fathom where they were coming from... maybe some bugs have been smashed?  That said, you need to like reading text, delving into the atmosphere and setting, and maybe digging into some number for character building.  I enjoy this.  Familiarity with 3rd edition D&D helped (Neverwinter Nights, etc will get you this), but Pathfinder adds some fun bells and whistles.  I could see some people not enjoying figuring out these bells and whistles, so I wouldn't recommend this game for the more casual action-RPG crowd.  Visuals are great, voice acting is appropriate (camping conversations do a great job of evoking character and relationships between NPCs) and the writing is stellar.  It is a major step forward in the design of plot and action:  kingdom building is well done and much better than prior iterations (NWN etc), but the plotting to which this is connected is brilliant.  Stories and adventures seem to emerge naturally (usually) from the circumstances of the world and (again, usually) you don't need to be lead by the nose, don't feel lead by the nose, but yet things will work out and progress naturally with minimal artificiality and little wasted time.  Indeed, it does a great job of making it a hard decision whether to spend your time strengthening your realm, questing, or exploring.  All are encouraged and all are fun.

Great game.  Atmospheric, fun, brilliantly written, and a real step forward from its predecessors, while very much standing on their back s and building upon all that was good in them.  Oh, I should note, there is a massive amount of content here and it is--no exaggeration--like buying two whole games like Pillars of Eternity!  Can't wait for a sequel.

The modern Tomb Raider series is often compared to the Uncharted franchise. For good reason too. They're action adventure games based around exploring historical or fantasy settings. Having recently played through the Uncharted games, I decided to give the first Crystal Dynamic's Tomb Raider game a chance.

And honestly, Tomb Raider compares quite well. For a game from 2013, Tomb Raider plays great and looks stunning to this day. While Uncharted has stronger characters and much better writing, Tomb Raider's environments, combat and action sequences rival the best of the Uncharted series imo.

Gameplay wise, Tomb Raider is fantastic. I found all the weapons to be fun to use, other than the shotgun which felt useless in 90% of scenarios. The movement and traversal is near perfect. The island and most of its settings are stunning and the game features plenty of high octane action sequences and gameplay sections throughout its runtime. 

Highly recommended.
Bloody excellent is all i gotta say my Lord

I absolutely loved the first game and this game is good.
Notice how I said good, not amazing or a masterpiece. This game is probably one you would play for about 300 hours and not really play anymore after that. If there is a new update you might come back to it for maybe a couple days or a week. I am a player of both PvP and Coop and I can tell you they are both pretty solid. There isn't much to work for so you really play it for the experience 
(although to play coop mode right now you have to be very good because the bots will fuck u up).

It has amazing gunplay and shooting people is fun, good fire support (the chemical gas is a bit underpowered), ok map design. It is supposed to be a mix between realism and arcade but NWI has been leaning towards the arcadey side. I would really like hardcore PvP to be a permanent thing in the playlist.

We recently got Night maps and while the Night Coop is meh, the Night PvP is pretty bad. You aren't able to adjust the brightness of the NVGs or the Sights. It is also either too bright or too dark, there is no in between (this would be fixed if u could adjust NVG brightness). You also cant shoot out lights or turn off the power to buildings. Since you can't get rid of light sources, you're stuck having to take off ur NVGs, switch to ur non ir flashlight, and when the time comes, put them back on. It just gets annoying. Night PvP sucks (for now, maybe it will get better).

I recommend if you want a medium length but sweet experience, avoid night PvP for now, and make sure you have a good pc otherwise ur in for a world of hurt. 
(I suggest an i7-7700, a 1650 super or higher, and 16gb of ram for the very high preset).

Revise: COOP mode is being fixed when 1.8 comes out.
Pre 1.8: PVP is the best mode to play.
1.8 also adds in some more optimization for those potatoes out there.

The Witcher 3:

Is the third installment of The Witcher trilogy, a story-driven open world RPG game that pulls you in with its gripping tale of Geralt of Riveria a Witcher. Whom's a professional monster slayer that searches for his beloved adopted daughter (Ciri) that have come back to their world, fleeing from the horrifying riders called The Wild Hunt.

Combat - 

The combat in this installment could be compared with one of the Dark Knight games, where you can freely switch from target to target but you can also lock onto a singular enemy which's mostly effective against large bulky monsters that don't have any back-up. You can use normal sword slashing as per usual, bombs that can shatter into smaller fragments, signs (Aard, Igni, Yrden, Quen and Axii) that all have their use in the right situation, you can also drink potions that'll further enhance your combat efficiencies and so on. So you've a variety of options to choose from when you're handling the monsters that you'll encounter in this dreadful world. How ever there's some issues with the combat that you may encounter at times like when you dodge it won't do it right and small things like that. 

Controls -

Phew, this is quite an hot potato that can be boiling at all times. It can be a challenge to Walk, Trot & Canter at certain times, for example when you're in forests where there can be wall branches or bushes that can make you stop doing anything, then there's in cities where you can't canter in only trot. Which can be quite an pain when there's over 1000m away from a quest you're doing. Somtimes when you're in combat it won't respond at times when you do a dodge, or block or heavy attack and don't get me started on horse combat but for the most of the time it's alright as per controls.

The World -

The world of the Witcher 3's not something a person should take lightly, just the starting area of the game (White Orchard) can make you sink in at least 5-7 hours depending on how you progress of course then there's Velen, Novigrad, The Skellige Isles, Kaer Morhen within the base game (Which are 2-3x times bigger than White Orchard) then there's Toussaint as well which comes with the Blood of Wine DLC, I've sunk over  305 hours of online game time along with 70 hours offline and I haven't done every side quest yet so there's plenty of things for you to do here. 

Voice acting - 

Now the voice acting is pretty impressive as well.
From each side character to the main ones, not a single line seemed out of place nor stuttering, didn't sound like they were voicing from a scipt at all, humanlike like if you'll. 
Many times voice acting can sound very robotic-ish, cause they put no emotion nor passion into it but they do so in here and I appreciate that plenty, good job. 

For now I've writting enough as my fingers are tired and wary from this galore of clicking. I may edit my review further, whom knows for now.

[h1]♪ Et j'lui ai dit : toi tu m'fous les glaaaaaaaaaann-andes, pis t'as rien à fout' dans mon monde. Arrache-toi d'là t'es pas d'ma baaaaaaaaaann-ande, casse-toi tu pues...et marche à l'ombre ♫[/h1]

[i]Chose amusante : lors du premier jour de jeu, l'un des personnages quitte effectivement le bar parce qu'il pue. Cocasse.[/i]

[b][i]VA-11 Hall-A: Cyberpunk Bartender Action[/i][/b] est un Visual Novel unique plein de bonnes choses. C'est un cocktail d'éléments finement mélangés qui flatte la vue et l'ouïe, qui stimule l'esprit, et qui réchauffe le coeur. Les ingrédients ? Les voici :

♦ D'abord, des personnages attachants, différents, et bien construits. Nombreux, qui plus est. Notre personnage, Jill, est une barmaid cynique qui travaille pour une Boss excentrique et guignolesque, avec un autre barman, Gill, un homme mystérieux affublé d'une "John Face". Quant aux clients, habitués ou non, eux aussi sont particuliers, hauts en couleur, et ont tous une histoire ou un avis à partager. Certains seront plus présents et profonds que d'autres bien sûr, mais tous sortiront du lot à leur manière.

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2171142303
♥ Le coeur d'un roman visuel, c'est une bonne histoire. Ou tout du moins, une histoire bien racontée. Celle de [b][i]VA-11 HALL-A[/i][/b], on la suit via les dialogues des personnages, les pensées de Jill, et les nouvelles sur le net avant d'aller travailler. Et on la suit bien, facilement, avec intérêt. Puisque comme elle nous est racontée par des dialogues, tout est écrit comme si c'était parlé. C'est donc vivant, teinté d'humour et d'expériences propres aux personnages. Alors c'est sûr qu'au début il faut un peu s'accrocher, car on découvre tout. On ne sait rien ou presque des personnages, de l'environnement, et du "contexte historique". Cela fait donc beaucoup d'informations à emmagasiner, et même si celles-ci sont apportées lentement, on peut avoir du mal à accrocher au début. Mais une fois qu'on visualise mieux la situation et les personnages...ça coule tout seul, on embarque sans même s'en rendre compte, et on se laisse porter jusqu'à la fin du jeu aussi naturellement que possible.
En fait, l'histoire du jeu est simplement composée des histoires des personnages. Comme elles sont toutes liées à au moins une autre et qu'elles se regroupent en passant toutes par le personnage principal (lui-même avec sa propre histoire), les choses se rassemblent naturellement et sont souvent (sans forcément être écrites noir sur blanc) bien appuyées par le jeu. Et si les "fins" ne sont pas mémorables, il n'en reste pas moins que le jeu incarne parfaitement la formule "ce n'est pas la destination qui compte, c'est le voyage". 

♠ Côté gameplay, c'est un VN, c'est donc évidemment très limité. Ici, on ne fait pas de choix en décidant d'une action ou d'un dialogue, on le fait en préparant et en servant des verres via un mini-jeu qu'on nous explique dès le premier jour. On a donc le choix entre servir au client ce qu'il demande, ou lui servir autre chose. Cela agit sur les dialogues entre Jill et les personnages, ainsi que sur l'argent reçu. Cet argent sert à garder Jill concentrée sur son travail (ce qui nous rappelle ce que le client demande, avec peut-être un indice supplémentaire) et à payer les factures afin d'atteindre la bonne fin. Cependant, pour obtenir certaines fins (et donc obtenir des informations supplémentaires pour ces histoires), il faut parfois lire entre les lignes et servir au client quelque chose qu'il n'a pas demandé. Mais cela reste rare, on se contentera la grande majorité du temps de servir la boisson demandée par le client. Ce mini-jeu casse légèrement la routine du VN et vient un peu impliquer le joueur dans le rôle de barmaid, ce qui est une bonne chose.

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2167372377
♣ Et enfin, les jeux, on les aime beaux. On les aime soignés. On les aime avec de bonnes musiques et une bonne ambiance pour y embarquer en moins de temps qu'il faut pour le dire. Et [b][i]VA-11 HALL-A[/i][/b], il est beau, sur tous les plans. C'est toujours un plus pour ce genre de jeu, mais là cela devient vraiment une force. Bien sûr, ça dépendra toujours des goûts de chacun, il faut aimer les graphismes pixels et les musiques très synthés pour vraiment apprécier l'ambiance néon du jeu. Mais si on aime, le jeu devient un vrai plaisir visuel et sonore.

Pour finir, je mentionne que si le jeu se déroule dans un monde dystopique et évoque souvent des sujets lourds et graves, il reste néanmoins bourré d'humour et de positivité (et de références au catch si ça vous parle). Certains passages et certaines histoires serrent le coeur, mais cela débouche toujours sur une certaine forme de positivité, pas nécessairement dans les faits mais au moins dans leurs interprétations et dans les leçons qu'en tirent les personnages. Bref, ce jeu n'est pas fait pour broyer du noir.

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2173168043
Voilà grosso modo ce qu'on va trouver dans [b][i]VA-11 Hall-A: Cyberpunk Bartender Action[/i][/b]. C'est un jeu plein d'humour et de personnages sympathiques, avec des histoires bien racontées, et une identité visuelle et sonore des plus agréables. Le tout mélangé et construit de manière à en faire ce qu'il est : un très bon Visual Novel. Si vous aimez le genre, il n'y a pas à hésiter, le jeu en vaut la chandelle.

For all its whimsical elements, [b]Battleblock Theater[/b] sure is one dull and repetitive game. I mean, your mileage may vary, especially considering how easy you get into the first few levels... but boy does running around in a maze get old fast. They don't even hide it: you play a prisoner forced to race through a maze like some laboratory rat for the amusement of entitled fatcats. A story which struck close enough to home for me to stop playing in favor of something affording me [i]real liberty of options.[/i] THAT'S how I broke out of your little prison, team [b]Behemoth[/b]!

In [b]Battleblock Theater[/b], your options consist of a double jump and unlockable weapons. Problem: [b]Battleblock Theater[/b] incentivizes you to race through the level and it's faster to avoid enemies than it is to defeat them. There aren't even any rewards for defeating the cats, so the weapons become entirely optional! Even if you come across the one weapon that could be used for platforming purposes (the Dart Gun), firing deviation makes for an unreliable platform generator! There would be good ideas such as the Vacuum, the Electric Fan or even the wallhugging frog with a bomb inside of it... But you should always run instead to get the best time possible and collect all the jewels all the time. What a waste of design space...

Weapons are cool, and not encouraging their use is a cardinal sin of gaming. Weapons provide you with control over an environment which antagonizes you. Ever since the Power Pellet in [b]Pacman[/b], there was a triumphant feeling of payback in chasing those ghosts once you finally had the upper hand! [b]Battleblock Theater[/b] doesn't get that! They treat weapons as collectables, bought with Yarn icons hidden throughout the stages, with little intrinsic value of their own! They're treated as rewards rather than gameplay mechanics, showing how [b]Behemoth[/b] just doesn't understand how a game works!

Other cardinal sin: Story Mode is artificially long. There are 8 chapters of 13 levels... but so much of it is essentially the same! Do you really want to do 100+ races of jumping, avoiding, looking for and collecting jewels? Really? What for? Then what about this: stages require you to collect 3 jewels to unlock the exit although most of them contain about 7 or so. Jewels are used to unlock prisoners at a cost of 10 per prisoner released. THERE ARE THREE HUNDRED PRISONERS TO FREE. WHY? When did grinding become a game feature??? This isn't replay value, this is just tiresome!

All the prisoners are the same blob figures with different heads. All the stages are hop and skip challenges over various deadly dangers. There are puzzles, but few puzzle mechanics. In fact, I'd say that the level editor might be more fun than the main game itself... I've started building a couple of maps, my heart half in it; there's definitely more depth in map building than in level completing but I guess when you're bored by the main mode, you can't really make good maps, now can you? I've also tried to complete other people's maps but this ended up as an exercise in frustration. What do you do when you can't complete a player-generated map? You downvote their creation and move on, it's all you can do.

So much missed opportunities! When playing these player-generated maps, you hunt for worthless "strawberries" rather than the jewels used for unlocking the prisoners. Why limit the rewards offered to people who'd explore everything a game has to offer? I can understand how some people could build maps for the express purpose of jewel farming, but if a portion of the game is so tiresome that you have to use exploits to get through it, then maybe it wasn't adequately implemented to begin with! Personally, I'd think it'd be fun for someone who enjoyed the Main Story to look into other people's maps for their "New Game +" experience. Finished everything that we offered you? How about trying these stages other people have made so as to unlock all the prisoners!

Online Play is similarly better than the main story because of greater interactivity between players BUT BEWARE OF LATENCY ISSUES! Even with all-green connectivity, your character WILL spaz about uncontrollably. Neat novelty factor that wears out its welcome even faster than Story Mode. Weapons gain a clear definite purpose now that you're actively seeking to defeat an opponent but this just leads to every player using the same loadout of insta-kill weapons. Physics altering weapons such as the Electric Fan and the Vacuum have absolutely no use in [b]Battleblock Theater[/b].

A whole lotta words for a Flash game sold on the cheap but I still regret my purchase. It's not incorrect to say that at such a low price, it remains good value for your money if you don't take everything as seriously as I do. Finish the levels you want and move on. Regardless, this is not an engaging gaming experience (and you can see I tried everything to get engaged) and thus I cannot endorse such a product.
